GE07mbh_03_u:37: 03,001.012a nedam asti kulaṃ sarvaṃ na vayaṃ na ca no gṛhāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:69: 03,001.027c dharmācārāḥ prahīyante na ca sidhyanti mānavāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:75: 03,001.030a te yuṣmāsu samastāś ca vyastāś caiveha sadguṇāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:82: 03,001.033a bhīṣmaḥ pitāmaho rājā viduro jananī ca me

GE07mbh_03_u:87: 03,001.035c svajane nyāsabhūte me kāryā snehānvitā matiḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:100: 03,001.041a anujagmuś ca tatraitān snehāt ke cid dvijātayaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:112: 03,002.001e tān uvāca tato rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:116: 03,002.003c parikleśaś ca vo manye dhruvaṃ tatra bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:118: 03,002.004c kiṃ punar mām ito viprā nivartadhvaṃ yatheṣṭataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:120: 03,002.005a gatir yā bhavatāṃ rājaṃs tāṃ vayaṃ gantum udyatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:122: 03,002.006a anukampāṃ hi bhakteṣu daivatāny api kurvate
GE07mbh_03_u:125: 03,002.007a mamāpi paramā bhaktir brāhmaṇeṣu sadā dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:127: 03,002.008a āhareyur hi me ye 'pi phalamūlamṛgāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:128: 03,002.008c ta ime śokajair duḥkhair bhrātaro me vimohitāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:132: 03,002.010a asmatpoṣaṇajā cintā mā bhūt te hṛdi pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:137: 03,002.012a evam etan na saṃdeho rameyaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:139: 03,002.013a kathaṃ drakṣyāmi vaḥ sarvān svayam āhṛtabhojanān

GE07mbh_03_u:143: 03,002.014c tam adhyātmaratir vidvāñ śaunako nāma vai dvijaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:179: 03,002.030a viprayoge na tu tyāgī doṣadarśī samāgamāt
GE07mbh_03_u:184: 03,002.032c na teṣu sajjate snehaḥ padmapatreṣv ivodakam
GE07mbh_03_u:186: 03,002.033c icchā saṃjāyate tasya tatas tṛṣṇā pravartate
GE07mbh_03_u:189: 03,002.035a yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:191: 03,002.036a anādyantā tu sā tṛṣṇā antardehagatā nṛṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:195: 03,002.038a rājataḥ salilād agneś corataḥ svajanād api
GE07mbh_03_u:196: 03,002.038b*0009_01 arthibhyaḥ kālatas tasmān nityam arthavatāṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_03_u:197: 03,002.038c bhayam arthavatāṃ nityaṃ mṛtyoḥ prāṇabhṛtām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:198: 03,002.039a yathā hy āmiṣam ākāśe pakṣibhiḥ śvāpadair bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:199: 03,002.039c bhakṣyate salile matsyais tathā sarveṇa vittavān
GE07mbh_03_u:200: 03,002.040a artha eva hi keṣāṃ cid anartho bhavitā nṛṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:201: 03,002.040c arthaśreyasi cāsakto na śreyo vindate naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:203: 03,002.041a kārpaṇyaṃ darpamānau ca bhayam udvega eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:204: 03,002.041c arthajāni viduḥ prājñā duḥkhāny etāni dehinām
GE07mbh_03_u:205: 03,002.042a arthasyopārjane duḥkhaṃ pālane ca kṣaye tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:206: 03,002.042c nāśe duḥkhaṃ vyaye duḥkhaṃ ghnanti caivārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_03_u:207: 03,002.043a arthā duḥkhaṃ parityaktuṃ pālitāś cāpi te 'sukhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:208: 03,002.043c duḥkhena cādhigamyante teṣāṃ nāśaṃ na cintayet
GE07mbh_03_u:210: 03,002.044c anto nāsti pipāsāyāḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_03_u:211: 03,002.045a tasmāt saṃtoṣam eveha dhanaṃ paśyanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:213: 03,002.045e aiśvaryaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyed eṣu na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:214: 03,002.046a tyajeta saṃcayāṃs tasmāt tajjaṃ kleśaṃ saheta kaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:215: 03,002.046c na hi saṃcayavān kaś cid dṛśyate nirupadravaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:216: 03,002.047a ataś ca dharmibhiḥ pumbhir anīhārthaḥ praśasyate
GE07mbh_03_u:217: 03,002.047b*0010_01 dharmārthaṃ yasya vittehā varaṃ tasya nirīhatā
GE07mbh_03_u:218: 03,002.047c prakṣālanād dhi paṅkasya dūrād asparśanaṃ varam
GE07mbh_03_u:219: 03,002.048a yudhiṣṭhiraivam artheṣu na spṛhāṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:220: 03,002.048c dharmeṇa yadi te kāryaṃ vimukteccho bhavārthataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:223: 03,002.049c bharaṇārthaṃ tu viprāṇāṃ brahman kāṅkṣe na lobhataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:224: 03,002.050a kathaṃ hy asmadvidho brahman vartamāno gṛhāśrame
GE07mbh_03_u:225: 03,002.050c bharaṇaṃ pālanaṃ cāpi na kuryād anuyāyinām
GE07mbh_03_u:226: 03,002.051a saṃvibhāgo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva śiṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:228: 03,002.052a tṛṇāni bhūmir udakaṃ vāk caturthī ca sūnṛtā
GE07mbh_03_u:229: 03,002.052c satām etāni geheṣu nocchidyante kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:231: 03,002.053c tṛṣitasya ca pānīyaṃ kṣudhitasya ca bhojanam
GE07mbh_03_u:232: 03,002.054a cakṣur dadyān mano dadyād vācaṃ dadyāc ca sūnṛtām
GE07mbh_03_u:233: 03,002.054b*0011_01 utthāya cāsanaṃ dadyād eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:237: 03,002.056a nātmārthaṃ pācayed annaṃ na vṛthā ghātayet paśūn
GE07mbh_03_u:238: 03,002.056c na ca tat svayam aśnīyād vidhivad yan na nirvapet
GE07mbh_03_u:239: 03,002.057a śvabhyaś ca śvapacebhyaś ca vayobhyaś cāvaped bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:243: 03,002.058d*0012_01 cakṣur dadyān mano dadyād vācaṃ dadyāc ca sūnṛtām
GE07mbh_03_u:247: 03,002.059a etāṃ yo vartate vṛttiṃ vartamāno gṛhāśrame
GE07mbh_03_u:248: 03,002.059c tasya dharmaṃ paraṃ prāhuḥ kathaṃ vā vipra manyase
GE07mbh_03_u:250: 03,002.060a aho bata mahat kaṣṭaṃ viparītam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_03_u:261: 03,002.065c viddhaḥ patati lobhāgnau jyotir lobhāt pataṃgavat
GE07mbh_03_u:262: 03,002.066a tato vihārair āhārair mohitaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:264: 03,002.067a evaṃ patati saṃsāre tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:267: 03,002.068c jale bhuvi tathākāśe jāyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:268: 03,002.069a abudhānāṃ gatis tv eṣā budhānām api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_03_u:269: 03,002.069c ye dharme śreyasi ratā vimokṣaratayo janāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:270: 03,002.070a yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca
GE07mbh_03_u:271: 03,002.070c tasmād dharmān imān sarvān nābhimānāt samācaret
GE07mbh_03_u:275: 03,002.072c kartavyam iti yat kāryaṃ nābhimānāt samācaret
GE07mbh_03_u:276: 03,002.073a uttaro devayānas tu sadbhir ācaritaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_03_u:279: 03,002.074c samyag vrataviśeṣāc ca samyak ca gurusevanāt
GE07mbh_03_u:286: 03,002.077a tathā tvam api kaunteya śamam āsthāya puṣkalam
GE07mbh_03_u:287: 03,002.077c tapasā siddhim anviccha yogasiddhiṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:288: 03,002.078a pitṛmātṛmayī siddhiḥ prāptā karmamayī ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:289: 03,002.078c tapasā siddhim anviccha dvijānāṃ bharaṇāya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:290: 03,002.079a siddhā hi yad yad icchanti kurvate tad anugrahāt
GE07mbh_03_u:297: 03,003.003a parityaktuṃ na śaknomi dānaśaktiś ca nāsti me
GE07mbh_03_u:298: 03,003.003c katham atra mayā kāryaṃ bhagavāṃs tad bravītu me
GE07mbh_03_u:299: 03,003.004a muhūrtam iva sa dhyātvā dharmeṇānviṣya tāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_03_u:301: 03,003.005a purā sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni pīḍyante kṣudhayā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:303: 03,003.005d*0013_01 sāntvayitvā tato devaḥ prāṇikārye yuyoja ca
GE07mbh_03_u:307: 03,003.007c divas tejaḥ samuddhṛtya janayām āsa vāriṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:309: 03,003.008c oṣadhyaḥ ṣaḍrasā medhyās tadannaṃ prāṇināṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_03_u:310: 03,003.009a evaṃ bhānumayaṃ hy annaṃ bhūtānāṃ prāṇadhāraṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:311: 03,003.009c pitaiṣa sarvabhūtānāṃ tasmāt taṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja
GE07mbh_03_u:313: 03,003.010c uddharanti prajāḥ sarvās tapa āsthāya puṣkalam
GE07mbh_03_u:316: 03,003.012a tathā tvam api dharmātman karmaṇā ca viśodhitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:317: 03,003.012c tapa āsthāya dharmeṇa dvijātīn bhara bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:318: 03,003.013a evam uktas tu dhaumyena tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:320: 03,003.013b*0015_01 tatas tv adhyāpayām āsa mantraṃ sarvārthasādhakam
GE07mbh_03_u:321: 03,003.013b*0015_02 aṣṭākṣaraṃ paraṃ mantram ārtasya satataṃ priyam
GE07mbh_03_u:327: 03,003.014f@001_0001 śuciḥ prayatavāg bhūtvā stotram ārabdhavāṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:329: 03,003.014f@001_0002 tvaṃ bhāno jagataś cakṣus tvam ātmā sarvadehinām
GE07mbh_03_u:330: 03,003.014f@001_0003 tvaṃ yoniḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvam ācāraḥ kriyāvatām
GE07mbh_03_u:331: 03,003.014f@001_0004 tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvasāṃkhyānāṃ yogināṃ tvaṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:333: 03,003.014f@001_0006 tvayā saṃdhāryate lokas tvayā lokaḥ prakāśyate
GE07mbh_03_u:335: 03,003.014f@001_0008 tvām upasthāya kāle tu brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:337: 03,003.014f@001_0010 tava divyaṃ rathaṃ yāntam anuyānti varārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:339: 03,003.014f@001_0012 trayastriṃśac ca vai devās tathā vaimānikā gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:340: 03,003.014f@001_0013 sopendrāḥ samahendrāś ca tvām iṣṭvā siddhim āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:341: 03,003.014f@001_0014 upayānty arcayitvā tu tvāṃ vai prāptamanorathāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:343: 03,003.014f@001_0016 guhyāḥ pitṛgaṇāḥ sapta ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:344: 03,003.014f@001_0017 te pūjayitvā tvām eva gacchantyāśu pradhānatām
GE07mbh_03_u:345: 03,003.014f@001_0018 vasavo maruto rudrā ye ca sādhyā marīcipāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:347: 03,003.014f@001_0020 sabrahmakeṣu lokeṣu saptasv apy akhileṣu ca
GE07mbh_03_u:348: 03,003.014f@001_0021 na tad bhūtam ahaṃ manye yad arkād atiricyate
GE07mbh_03_u:349: 03,003.014f@001_0022 santi cānyāni sattvāni vīryavanti mahānti ca
GE07mbh_03_u:350: 03,003.014f@001_0023 na tu teṣāṃ tathā dīptiḥ prabhāvo vā yathā tava

GE07mbh_03_u:352: 03,003.014f@001_0025 tvayi satyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca sarve bhāvāś ca sāttvikāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:357: 03,003.014f@001_0030 tapanty anye dahanty anye garjanty anye tathā ghanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:359: 03,003.014f@001_0032 na tathā sukhayaty agnir na prāvārā na kambalāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:363: 03,003.014f@001_0036 tava yady udayo na syād andhaṃ jagad idaṃ bhavet

GE07mbh_03_u:377: 03,003.014f@001_0050 tvām indram āhus tvaṃ rudras tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:378: 03,003.014f@001_0051 tvam agnis tvaṃ manaḥ sūkṣmaṃ prabhus tvaṃ brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_03_u:379: 03,003.014f@001_0052 tvaṃ haṃsaḥ savitā bhānur aṃśumālī vṛṣākapiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:380: 03,003.014f@001_0053 vivasvān mihiraḥ pūṣā mitro dharmas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:381: 03,003.014f@001_0054 sahasraraśmir ādityas tapanas tvaṃ gavāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:382: 03,003.014f@001_0055 mārtaṇḍo 'rko raviḥ sūryaḥ śaraṇyo dinakṛt tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:384: 03,003.014f@001_0057 āśugāmī tamoghnaś ca haritāśvaś ca kīrtyase
GE07mbh_03_u:385: 03,003.014f@001_0058 saptamyām atha vā ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhaktyā pūjāṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:387: 03,003.014f@001_0060 na teṣām āpadaḥ santi nādhayo vyādhayas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:393: 03,003.014f@001_0066 ye ca te 'nucarāḥ sarve pādopāntaṃ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:395: 03,003.014f@001_0068 kṣubhayā sahitā maitrī yāś cānyā bhūtamātaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:396: 03,003.014f@001_0069 tāś ca sarvā namasyāmi pāntu māṃ śaraṇāgatam
GE07mbh_03_u:402: 03,003.015a kathaṃ kurūṇām ṛṣabhaḥ sa tu rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:404: 03,003.015d*0018_01 mayi sneho 'sti ced brahman yady anugrahabhāg aham
GE07mbh_03_u:405: 03,003.015d*0018_02 bhagavan nāsti ced guhyaṃ tac ca me brūhi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_03_u:408: 03,003.016c kṣaṇaṃ ca kuru rājendra sarvaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:409: 03,003.017a dhaumyena tu yatha proktaṃ pārthāya sumahātmane
GE07mbh_03_u:410: 03,003.017c nāmnām aṣṭaśataṃ puṇyaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāmate
GE07mbh_03_u:411: 03,003.018a sūryo 'ryamā bhagas tvaṣṭā pūṣārkaḥ savitā raviḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:412: 03,003.018c gabhastimān ajaḥ kālo mṛtyur dhātā prabhākaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:413: 03,003.019a pṛthivy āpaś ca tejaś ca khaṃ vāyuś ca parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:414: 03,003.019c somo bṛhaspatiḥ śukro budho 'ṅgāraka eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:415: 03,003.020a indro vivasvān dīptāṃśuḥ śuciḥ śauriḥ śanaiścaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:416: 03,003.020c brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudraś ca skando vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:417: 03,003.021a vaidyuto jāṭharaś cāgnir aindhanas tejasāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:419: 03,003.022a kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliḥ sarvāmarāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:420: 03,003.022c kalā kāṣṭhā muhūrtāś ca pakṣā māsā ṛtus tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:438: 03,003.030a śakrāc ca nāradaḥ prāpto dhaumyaś ca tadanantaram
GE07mbh_03_u:439: 03,003.030c dhaumyād yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāpya sarvān kāmān avāptavān
GE07mbh_03_u:447: smṛtiṃ ca medhāṃ ca sa vindate parām
GE07mbh_03_u:453: 03,004.001a tato divākaraḥ prīto darśayām āsa pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_03_u:455: 03,004.002a yat te 'bhilaṣitaṃ rājan sarvam etad avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:456: 03,004.002c aham annaṃ pradāsyāmi sapta pañca ca te samāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:458: 03,004.003b*0021_01 gṛhṇīṣva piṭharaṃ tāmraṃ mayā dattaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:461: 03,004.003d*0022_01 itaś caturdaśe varṣe bhūyo rājyam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:462: 03,004.003e dhanaṃ ca vividhaṃ tubhyam ity uktvāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_03_u:465: 03,004.003f@002_0003 tat tasya dadyāc ca ravir manīṣitaṃ
GE07mbh_03_u:466: 03,004.003f@002_0004 tad āpnuyād yady api tat sudurlabham
GE07mbh_03_u:467: 03,004.003f@002_0005 yaś cedaṃ dhārayen nityaṃ śṛṇuyād vāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:468: 03,004.003f@002_0006 putrārthī labhate putraṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:469: 03,004.003f@002_0007 vidyārthī labhate vidyāṃ puruṣo 'py atha vā striyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:470: 03,004.003f@002_0008 ubhe saṃdhye paṭhen nityaṃ nārī vā puruṣo yadi
GE07mbh_03_u:471: 03,004.003f@002_0009 āpadaṃ prāpya mucyeta baddho mucyeta bandhanāt
GE07mbh_03_u:472: 03,004.003f@002_0010 etad brahmā dadau pūrvaṃ śakrāya sumahātmane
GE07mbh_03_u:473: 03,004.003f@002_0011 śakrāc ca nāradaḥ prāpto dhaumyas tu tadanantaram
GE07mbh_03_u:474: 03,004.003f@002_0012 dhaumyād yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāpya sarvān kāmān avāptavān
GE07mbh_03_u:475: 03,004.003f@002_0013 saṃgrāme ca jayen nityaṃ vipulaṃ cāpnuyād vasu
GE07mbh_03_u:477: 03,004.004a labdhvā varaṃ tu kaunteyo jalād uttīrya dharmavit
GE07mbh_03_u:480: 03,004.004d*0023_01 tvatprasādād dvijaśreṣṭha yad iṣṭaṃ prāptavān aham
GE07mbh_03_u:482: 03,004.005c mahānase tadānnaṃ tu sādhayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:483: 03,004.006a saṃskṛtaṃ prasavaṃ yāti vanyam annaṃ caturvidham
GE07mbh_03_u:484: 03,004.006c akṣayyaṃ vardhate cānnaṃ tena bhojayate dvijān
GE07mbh_03_u:486: 03,004.007c śeṣaṃ vighasasaṃjñaṃ tu paścād bhuṅkte yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:500: dharmaṃ ca tvaṃ paramaṃ vettha sūkṣmam
GE07mbh_03_u:503: 03,005.003a evaṃ gate vidura yad adya kāryaṃ;
GE07mbh_03_u:508: 03,005.003d*0024_02 krūram ācaritaṃ karma na me priyam anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_03_u:509: 03,005.003d*0024_03 tathaivaṃ hi kṛte tatra tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:510: 03,005.003d*0024_04 uttaraṃ prāptakālaṃ ca kim anyan manyate kṣamam
GE07mbh_03_u:511: 03,005.003d*0024_05 nāsti dharme sahāyatvam iti me dīryate manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:512: 03,005.003d*0024_06 yatra pāṇḍusutāḥ sarve kliśyanti vanam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:530: 03,005.007d*0025_01 yaśo na naśyej jñātibhedaś ca na syād
GE07mbh_03_u:531: 03,005.007d*0025_02 dharmo na syān naiva caivaṃ kṛte tvām
GE07mbh_03_u:534: 03,005.008c evaṃ śeṣaṃ yadi putreṣu te syād;
GE07mbh_03_u:543: teṣāṃ loke kiṃ nu na prāpyam asti
GE07mbh_03_u:545: 03,005.010d*0026_02 teṣāṃ loke kiṃ nu duṣprāpam asti
GE07mbh_03_u:547: mayā yat te hitam āsīt tadānīm
GE07mbh_03_u:549: etad rājan na ca tat tvaṃ cakartha
GE07mbh_03_u:550: 03,005.011e idānīṃ te hitam uktaṃ na cet tvaṃ;
GE07mbh_03_u:552: 03,005.012a yady etad evam anumantā sutas te;
GE07mbh_03_u:554: 03,005.012c tāpo na te vai bhavitā prītiyogāt;
GE07mbh_03_u:555: tvaṃ cen na gṛhṇāsi sutaṃ sahāyaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:574: 03,005.015c tvayā pṛṣṭaḥ kim aham anyad vadeyam;
GE07mbh_03_u:577: 03,005.016a etad vākyaṃ vidura yat te sabhāyām;
GE07mbh_03_u:578: iha proktaṃ pāṇḍavān prāpya māṃ ca
GE07mbh_03_u:581: 03,005.017a idaṃ tv idānīṃ kuta eva niścitaṃ;
GE07mbh_03_u:589: 03,005.019a sa mā jihmaṃ vidura sarvaṃ bravīṣi;
GE07mbh_03_u:591: 03,005.019c yathecchakaṃ gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā tvaṃ;
GE07mbh_03_u:599: 03,006.001a pāṇḍavās tu vane vāsam uddiśya bharatarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:602: 03,006.002c yayur vanenaiva vanaṃ satataṃ paścimāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_03_u:605: 03,006.004a tatra te nyavasan vīrā vane bahumṛgadvije
GE07mbh_03_u:607: 03,006.005a viduras tv api pāṇḍūnāṃ tadā darśanalālasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:616: kiṃ nu kṣattā vakṣyati naḥ sametya
GE07mbh_03_u:627: 03,006.010c taiḥ satkṛtaḥ sa ca tān ājamīḍho;
GE07mbh_03_u:640: 03,006.013c tad vai pathyaṃ tan mano nābhyupaiti;
GE07mbh_03_u:641: tataś cāhaṃ kṣamam anyan na manye
GE07mbh_03_u:643: na me tac ca śrutavān āmbikeyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:653: jalaṃ na tiṣṭhet pathyam uktaṃ tathāsmin
GE07mbh_03_u:660: 03,006.018c tad vai sarvaṃ yan mayoktaṃ sabhāyāṃ;
GE07mbh_03_u:665: sa vai bhuṅkte pṛthivīm eka eva
GE07mbh_03_u:682: tad vai vācyaṃ tat kariṣyāmi kṛtsnam
GE07mbh_03_u:684: 03,007.001a gate tu vidure rājann āśramaṃ pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_03_u:687: 03,007.001d*0030_02 vivṛddhiṃ ca parāṃ matvā pāṇḍavānāṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:691: 03,007.003a sa tu labdhvā punaḥ saṃjñāṃ samutthāya mahītalāt
GE07mbh_03_u:693: 03,007.004a bhrātā mama suhṛc caiva sākṣād dharma ivāparaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:694: 03,007.004c tasya smṛtvādya subhṛśaṃ hṛdayaṃ dīryatīva me
GE07mbh_03_u:695: 03,007.005a tam ānayasva dharmajñaṃ mama bhrātaram āśu vai
GE07mbh_03_u:696: 03,007.005c iti bruvan sa nṛpatiḥ karuṇaṃ paryadevayat
GE07mbh_03_u:698: 03,007.006c bhrātṛsnehād idaṃ rājan saṃjayaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:699: 03,007.007a gaccha saṃjaya jānīhi bhrātaraṃ viduraṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:700: 03,007.007c yadi jīvati roṣeṇa mayā pāpena nirdhutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:701: 03,007.008a na hi tena mama bhrātrā susūkṣmam api kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:703: 03,007.009a sa vyalīkaṃ kathaṃ prāpto mattaḥ paramabuddhimān
GE07mbh_03_u:704: 03,007.009c na jahyāj jīvitaṃ prājñas taṃ gacchānaya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_03_u:705: 03,007.010a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā rājñas tam anumānya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:706: 03,007.010c saṃjayo bāḍham ity uktvā prādravat kāmyakaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:707: 03,007.011a so 'cireṇa samāsādya tad vanaṃ yatra pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:713: 03,007.014a rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ sa kuśalaṃ sukhāsīnaś ca saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:716: 03,007.015c taṃ paśya gatvā tvaṃ kṣipraṃ saṃjīvaya ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_03_u:719: 03,007.017a evam uktas tu viduro dhīmān svajanavatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:721: 03,007.017d*0032_01 so 'bhigatvā tadā veśma rājñaḥ samabhivādya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:724: 03,007.018c diṣṭyā prāpto 'si dharmajña diṣṭyā smarasi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:725: 03,007.019a adya rātrau divā cāhaṃ tvatkṛte bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:727: 03,007.020a so 'ṅkam ādāya viduraṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya caiva ha
GE07mbh_03_u:728: 03,007.020c kṣamyatām iti covāca yad ukto 'si mayā ruṣā
GE07mbh_03_u:730: 03,007.020d*0033_02 yudhiṣṭhiras tu kuśalī bhrātṛbhiḥ saha tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_03_u:731: 03,007.020d*0033_03 atha rātriṃ dinaṃ cāhaṃ tvatkṛte bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:732: 03,007.020d*0033_04 prītas tvam eva me nityaṃ bhrātā sarvaguṇānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:734: 03,007.021a kṣāntam eva mayā rājan gurur naḥ paramo bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:735: 03,007.021c tathā hy asmy āgataḥ kṣipraṃ tvaddarśanaparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:738: 03,007.023a pāṇḍoḥ sutā yādṛśā me tādṛśā me sutās tava
GE07mbh_03_u:739: 03,007.023c dīnā iti hi me buddhir abhipannādya tān prati
GE07mbh_03_u:742: 03,007.024c viduro dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca lebhāte paramāṃ mudam
GE07mbh_03_u:744: 03,008.001a śrutvā ca viduraṃ prāptaṃ rājñā ca parisāntvitam
GE07mbh_03_u:749: 03,008.003c viduraḥ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ suhṛd vidvān hite rataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:750: 03,008.004a yāvad asya punar buddhiṃ viduro nāpakarṣati
GE07mbh_03_u:752: 03,008.005a atha paśyāmy ahaṃ pārthān prāptān iha kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:755: 03,008.006c kariṣye na hi tān ṛddhān punar draṣṭum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_03_u:757: 03,008.007a kiṃ bāliṣāṃ matiṃ rājann āsthito 'si viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:758: 03,008.007c gatās te samayaṃ kṛtvā naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:760: 03,008.008c pitus te vacanaṃ tāta na grahīṣyanti karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:761: 03,008.009a atha vā te grahīṣyanti punar eṣyanti vā puram
GE07mbh_03_u:767: 03,008.011a evam etan mahāprājña yathā vadasi mātula
GE07mbh_03_u:768: 03,008.011c nityaṃ hi me kathayatas tava buddhir hi rocate
GE07mbh_03_u:769: 03,008.011d*0035_01 tathā tad bhavitā rājan nānyathā tad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:771: 03,008.011d*0036_02 āgaccheyuś ca te mohāt punar dyūtaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:774: 03,008.012c aikamatyaṃ hi no rājan sarveṣām eva lakṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:776: 03,008.013a evam uktas tu karṇena rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:778: 03,008.014a upalabhya tataḥ karṇo vivṛtya nayane śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:779: 03,008.014c roṣād duḥśāsanaṃ caiva saubaleyaṃ ca tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_03_u:781: 03,008.015c aho mama mataṃ yat tan nibodhata narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:783: 03,008.016c na cāsya śaknumaḥ sarve priye sthātum atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:784: 03,008.017a vayaṃ tu śastrāṇy ādāya rathān āsthāya daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:786: 03,008.018a teṣu sarveṣu śānteṣu gateṣv aviditāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_03_u:789: 03,008.019c yāvan mitravihīnāś ca tāvac chakyā mataṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:790: 03,008.020a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā pūjayantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:791: 03,008.020c bāḍham ity eva te sarve pratyūcuḥ sūtajaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:793: 03,008.021a evam uktvā tu saṃkruddhā rathaiḥ sarve pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_03_u:801: 03,009.001c vakṣyāmi tvā kauravāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ hitam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:802: 03,009.002a na me priyaṃ mahābāho yad gatāḥ pāṇḍavā vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:804: 03,009.003a te smarantaḥ parikleśān varṣe pūrṇe trayodaśe
GE07mbh_03_u:806: 03,009.004a tad ayaṃ kiṃ nu pāpātmā tava putraḥ sumandadhīḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:808: 03,009.005a vāryatāṃ sādhv ayaṃ mūḍhaḥ śamaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:809: 03,009.005c vanasthāṃs tān ayaṃ hantum icchan prāṇair vimokṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:810: 03,009.006a yathāha viduraḥ prājño yathā bhīṣmo yathā vayam
GE07mbh_03_u:811: 03,009.006c yathā kṛpaś ca droṇaś ca tathā sādhu vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_03_u:813: 03,009.007c adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca mā rājan pratipadyathāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:814: 03,009.008a samīkṣā yādṛśī hy asya pāṇḍavān prati bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:815: 03,009.008c upekṣyamāṇā sā rājan mahāntam anayaṃ spṛśet
GE07mbh_03_u:816: 03,009.009a atha vāyaṃ sumandātmā vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:818: 03,009.010a tataḥ saṃsargajaḥ snehaḥ putrasya tava pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:819: 03,009.010c yadi syāt kṛtakāryo 'dya bhaves tvaṃ manujeśvara
GE07mbh_03_u:820: 03,009.011a atha vā jāyamānasya yac chīlam anujāyate
GE07mbh_03_u:822: 03,009.012a kathaṃ vā manyate bhīṣmo droṇo vā viduro 'pi vā
GE07mbh_03_u:823: 03,009.012c bhavān vātra kṣamaṃ kāryaṃ purā cārtho 'tivartate
GE07mbh_03_u:825: 03,010.001a bhagavan nāham apy etad rocaye dyūtasaṃstavam
GE07mbh_03_u:826: 03,010.001c manye tad vidhinākramya kārito 'smīti vai mune
GE07mbh_03_u:827: 03,010.002a naitad rocayate bhīṣmo na droṇo viduro na ca
GE07mbh_03_u:828: 03,010.002c gāndhārī necchati dyūtaṃ tac ca mohāt pravartitam
GE07mbh_03_u:832: 03,010.004a vaicitravīrya nṛpate satyam āha yathā bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:833: 03,010.004c dṛḍhaṃ vedmi paraṃ putraṃ paraṃ putrān na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:835: 03,010.005c anyaiḥ samṛddhair apy arthair na sutād vidyate param
GE07mbh_03_u:836: 03,010.006a atra te vartayiṣyāmi mahad ākhyānam uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:837: 03,010.006c surabhyāś caiva saṃvādam indrasya ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:839: 03,010.007c gavāṃ māta purā tāta tām indro 'nvakṛpāyata
GE07mbh_03_u:841: 03,010.008a kim idaṃ rodiṣi śubhe kaccit kṣemaṃ divaukasām
GE07mbh_03_u:842: 03,010.008c mānuṣeṣv atha vā goṣu naitad alpaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:844: 03,010.009a vinipāto na vaḥ kaś cid dṛśyate tridaśādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:845: 03,010.009c ahaṃ tu putraṃ śocāmi tena rodimi kauśika
GE07mbh_03_u:846: 03,010.010a paśyainaṃ karṣakaṃ raudraṃ durbalaṃ mama putrakam
GE07mbh_03_u:848: 03,010.011a etaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhṛśaṃ śrantaṃ vadhyamānaṃ surādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:852: 03,010.012e kṛcchrād udvahate bhāraṃ taṃ vai śocāmi vāsava

GE07mbh_03_u:2501: 03,029.017a asthāne yadi vā sthāne satataṃ rajasāvṛtaḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:2510: 03,029.021c tasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva

GE07mbh_03_u:2548: 03,030.000*0101_04 yena krodhaṃ mahāprājñe bahudhā bahu manyase

GE07mbh_03_u:2570: 03,030.009a ātmānaṃ ca paraṃ caiva trāyate mahato bhayāt

GE07mbh_03_u:2577: 03,030.012c sa nāśayitvā kleṣṭāraṃ paraloke ca nandati

GE07mbh_03_u:2581: 03,030.014c kṣamāvato jayo nityaṃ sādhor iha satāṃ matam
GE07mbh_03_u:2583: 03,030.015c tam evaṃ bahudoṣaṃ tu krodhaṃ sādhuvivarjitam
GE07mbh_03_u:2585: 03,030.016a tejasvīti yam āhur vai paṇḍitā dīrghadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2587: 03,030.017a yas tu krodhaṃ samutpannaṃ prajñayā pratibādhate

GE07mbh_03_u:2591: 03,030.019a hanty avadhyān api kruddho gurūn rūkṣais tudaty api

GE07mbh_03_u:2594: 03,030.020c guṇāḥ krodhābhibhūtena na śakyāḥ prāptum añjasā
GE07mbh_03_u:2595: 03,030.021a krodhaṃ tyaktvā tu puruṣaḥ samyak tejo 'bhipadyate
GE07mbh_03_u:2597: 03,030.022a krodhas tv apaṇḍitaiḥ śaśvat teja ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_03_u:2598: 03,030.022c rajas tal lokanāśāya vihitaṃ mānuṣān prati
GE07mbh_03_u:2599: 03,030.023a tasmāc chaśvat tyajet krodhaṃ puruṣaḥ samyag ācaran
GE07mbh_03_u:2600: 03,030.023c śreyān svadharmānapago na kruddha iti niścitam
GE07mbh_03_u:2602: 03,030.024c atikramo madvidhasya kathaṃ svit syād anindite
GE07mbh_03_u:2603: 03,030.025a yadi na syur manuṣyeṣu kṣamiṇaḥ pṛthivīsamāḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:2616: 03,030.031c tasmāj janma ca bhūtānāṃ bhavaś ca pratipadyate

GE07mbh_03_u:2619: 03,030.033a ākruṣṭas tāḍitaḥ kruddhaḥ kṣamate yo balīyasā

GE07mbh_03_u:2621: 03,030.034a prabhāvavān api naras tasya lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2622: 03,030.034c krodhanas tv alpavijñānaḥ pretya ceha ca naśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:2625: 03,030.036a kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamā yajñaḥ kṣamā vedāḥ kṣamā śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:2626: 03,030.036c yas tām evaṃ vijānāti sa sarvaṃ kṣantum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:2627: 03,030.037a kṣamā brahma kṣamā satyaṃ kṣamā bhūtaṃ ca bhāvi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:2628: 03,030.037c kṣamā tapaḥ kṣamā śaucaṃ kṣamayā coddhṛtaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_03_u:2629: 03,030.038a ati brahmavidāṃ lokān ati cāpi tapasvinām

GE07mbh_03_u:2631: 03,030.039a kṣamā tejasvināṃ tejaḥ kṣamā brahma tapasvinām
GE07mbh_03_u:2632: 03,030.039c kṣamā satyaṃ satyavatāṃ kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2633: 03,030.040a tāṃ kṣamām īdṛśīṃ kṛṣṇe katham asmadvidhas tyajet
GE07mbh_03_u:2634: 03,030.040c yasyāṃ brahma ca satyaṃ ca yajñā lokāś ca viṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2635: 03,030.040e bhujyante yajvanāṃ lokāḥ kṣamiṇām apare tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:2638: 03,030.041c yadā hi kṣamate sarvaṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:2639: 03,030.042a kṣamāvatām ayaṃ lokaḥ paraś caiva kṣamāvatām

GE07mbh_03_u:2641: 03,030.043a yeṣāṃ manyur manuṣyāṇāṃ kṣamayā nihataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_03_u:2642: 03,030.043c teṣāṃ paratare lokās tasmāt kṣāntiḥ parā matā

GE07mbh_03_u:2646: 03,030.045c ācāryo viduraḥ kṣattā śamam eva vadiṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2648: 03,030.045e kṛpaś ca saṃjayaś caiva śamam eva vadiṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2649: 03,030.046a somadatto yuyutsuś ca droṇaputras tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:2650: 03,030.046c pitāmahaś ca no vyāsaḥ śamaṃ vadati nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2651: 03,030.047a etair hi rājā niyataṃ codyamānaḥ śamaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:2652: 03,030.047c rājyaṃ dāteti me buddhir na cel lobhān naśiṣyati

GE07mbh_03_u:2655: 03,030.048b*0106_01 kṣayaḥ sarvasya lokasya pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:2657: 03,030.048c niścitaṃ me sadaivaitat purastād api bhāmini
GE07mbh_03_u:2658: 03,030.049a suyodhano nārhatīti kṣamām evaṃ na vindati
GE07mbh_03_u:2659: 03,030.049c arhas tasyāham ity eva tasmān māṃ vindate kṣamā
GE07mbh_03_u:2660: 03,030.050a etad ātmavatāṃ vṛttam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2661: 03,030.050c kṣamā caivānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca tat kartāsmy aham añjasā
GE07mbh_03_u:2663: 03,031.001a namo dhātre vidhātre ca yau mohaṃ cakratus tava
GE07mbh_03_u:2666: 03,031.001d*0107_02 tasmāt karmāṇi nityāni lobhān mokṣaṃ yiyāsati
GE07mbh_03_u:2667: 03,031.002a neha dharmānṛśaṃsyābhyāṃ na kṣāntyā nārjavena ca

GE07mbh_03_u:2669: 03,031.003a tvāṃ ced vyasanam abhyāgād idaṃ bhārata duḥsaham
GE07mbh_03_u:2670: 03,031.003c yat tvaṃ nārhasi nāpīme bhrātaras te mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2671: 03,031.004a na hi te 'dhyagamaj jātu tadānīṃ nādya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:2672: 03,031.004c dharmāt priyataraṃ kiṃ cid api cej jīvitād iha
GE07mbh_03_u:2673: 03,031.005a dharmārtham eva te rājyaṃ dharmārthaṃ jīvitaṃ ca te

GE07mbh_03_u:2675: 03,031.006a bhīmasenārjunau caiva mādreyau ca mayā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:2676: 03,031.006c tyajes tvam iti me buddhir na tu dharmaṃ parityajeḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2678: 03,031.007c iti me śrutam āryāṇāṃ tvāṃ tu manye na rakṣati
GE07mbh_03_u:2679: 03,031.008a ananyā hi naravyāghra nityadā dharmam eva te
GE07mbh_03_u:2680: 03,031.008c buddhiḥ satatam anveti chāyeva puruṣaṃ nijā
GE07mbh_03_u:2682: 03,031.009a nāvamaṃsthā hi sadṛśān nāvarāñ śreyasaḥ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2683: 03,031.009c avāpya pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ na te śṛṅgam avardhata
GE07mbh_03_u:2684: 03,031.010a svāhākāraiḥ svadhābhiś ca pūjābhir api ca dvijān
GE07mbh_03_u:2685: 03,031.010c daivatāni pitṝṃś caiva satataṃ pārtha sevase
GE07mbh_03_u:2686: 03,031.011a brāhmaṇāḥ sarvakāmais te satataṃ pārtha tarpitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:2687: 03,031.011c yatayo mokṣiṇaś caiva gṛhasthāś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:2690: 03,031.012c nādeyaṃ brāhmaṇebhyas te gṛhe kiṃ cana vidyate

GE07mbh_03_u:2699: 03,031.016c etair api mahāyajñair iṣṭaṃ te bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:2704: 03,031.019a atīva moham āyāti manaś ca paridūyate

GE07mbh_03_u:3105: 03,034.065a evam eva manuṣyendra dharmaṃ tyaktvālpakaṃ naraḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:3108: 03,034.066c bhinnair mitraiḥ parityaktaṃ durbalaṃ kurute vaśe

GE07mbh_03_u:3116: 03,034.070c vidhinā pālanaṃ bhūmer yat kṛtaṃ naḥ pitāmahaiḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:11891: 03,127.014a ekaḥ kathaṃ cid utpannaḥ putro jantur ayaṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:11892: 03,127.014c yatamānasya sarvāsu kiṃ nu duḥkham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_03_u:11893: 03,127.015a vayaś ca samatītaṃ me sabhāryasya dvijottama
GE07mbh_03_u:11895: 03,127.016a syān nu karma tathā yuktaṃ yena putraśataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:11896: 03,127.016c mahatā laghunā vāpi karmaṇā duṣkareṇa vā
GE07mbh_03_u:11898: 03,127.017a asti vai tādṛśaṃ karma yena putraśataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:11899: 03,127.017c yadi śaknoṣi tat kartum atha vakṣyāmi somaka
GE07mbh_03_u:11902: 03,127.018a kāryaṃ vā yadi vākāryaṃ yena putraśataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:11903: 03,127.018c kṛtam eva hi tad viddhi bhagavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_03_u:11905: 03,127.019a yajasva jantunā rājaṃs tvaṃ mayā vitate kratau
GE07mbh_03_u:11906: 03,127.019c tataḥ putraśataṃ śrīmad bhaviṣyaty acireṇa te
GE07mbh_03_u:11908: 03,127.020c tatas tāḥ sumahāvīryāñ janayiṣyanti te sutān
GE07mbh_03_u:11909: 03,127.021a tasyām eva tu te jantur bhavitā punar ātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11910: 03,127.021c uttare cāsya sauvarṇaṃ lakṣma pārśve bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:11912: 03,128.001a brahman yad yad yathā kāryaṃ tat tat kuru tathā tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:11916: 03,128.002a tataḥ sa yājayām āsa somakaṃ tena jantunā
GE07mbh_03_u:11917: 03,128.002c mātaras tu balāt putram apākarṣuḥ kṛpānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11919: 03,128.003c taṃ mātaraḥ pratyakarṣan gṛhītvā dakṣiṇe kare
GE07mbh_03_u:11920: 03,128.003e savye pāṇau gṛhītvā tu yājako 'pi sma karṣati
GE07mbh_03_u:11921: 03,128.004a kurarīṇām ivārtānām apākṛṣya tu taṃ sutam
GE07mbh_03_u:11922: 03,128.004c viśasya cainaṃ vidhinā vapām asya juhāva saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11925: 03,128.005e sarvāś ca garbhān alabhaṃs tatas tāḥ pārthivāṅganāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11926: 03,128.006a tato daśasu māseṣu somakasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:11927: 03,128.006c jajñe putraśataṃ pūrṇaṃ tāsu sarvāsu bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:11928: 03,128.007a jantur jyeṣṭhaḥ samabhavaj janitryām eva bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:11929: 03,128.007c sa tāsām iṣṭa evāsīn na tathānye nijāḥ sutāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11930: 03,128.008a tac ca lakṣaṇam asyāsīt sauvarṇaṃ pārśva uttare
GE07mbh_03_u:11931: 03,128.008c tasmin putraśate cāgryaḥ sa babhūva guṇair yutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11933: 03,128.009a tataḥ sa lokam agamat somakasya guruḥ param
GE07mbh_03_u:11934: 03,128.009c atha kāle vyatīte tu somako 'py agamat param
GE07mbh_03_u:11935: 03,128.010a atha taṃ narake ghore pacyamānaṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11936: 03,128.010c tam apṛcchat kimarthaṃ tvaṃ narake pacyase dvija
GE07mbh_03_u:11937: 03,128.011a tam abravīd guruḥ so 'tha pacyamāno 'gninā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:11938: 03,128.011c tvaṃ mayā yājito rājaṃs tasyedaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_03_u:11939: 03,128.012a etac chrutvā sa rājarṣir dharmarājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:11940: 03,128.012c aham atra pravekṣyāmi mucyatāṃ mama yājakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11942: 03,128.012f*0626_01 so 'ham ātmānam ādhāsye narake mucyatāṃ guruḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11944: 03,128.013a nānyaḥ kartuḥ phalaṃ rājann upabhuṅkte kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:11945: 03,128.013b*0627_01 yadi te 'sya phalaṃ rājann upabhojyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:11946: 03,128.013c imāni tava dṛśyante phalāni dadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:11947: 03,128.013d*0628_01 duṣkṛtaṃ cāsya vindethā mucyate tvadgurur yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:11949: 03,128.014a puṇyān na kāmaye lokān ṛte 'haṃ brahmavādinam
GE07mbh_03_u:11950: 03,128.014c icchāmy aham anenaiva saha vastuṃ surālaye
GE07mbh_03_u:11951: 03,128.015a narake vā dharmarāja karmaṇāsya samo hy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:11952: 03,128.015c puṇyāpuṇyaphalaṃ deva samam astv āvayor idam
GE07mbh_03_u:11954: 03,128.016a yady evam īpsitaṃ rājan bhuṅkṣvāsya sahitaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_03_u:11957: 03,128.017a sa cakāra tathā sarvaṃ rājā rājīvalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11958: 03,128.017b*0629_01 kṣīṇapāpaś ca tasmāt sa vimukto guruṇā saha
GE07mbh_03_u:11959: 03,128.017c punaś ca lebhe lokān svān karmaṇā nirjitāñ śubhān
GE07mbh_03_u:11960: 03,128.017e saha tenaiva vipreṇa guruṇā sa gurupriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11961: 03,128.018a eṣa tasyāśramaḥ puṇyo ya eṣo 'gre virājate
GE07mbh_03_u:11962: 03,128.018c kṣānta uṣyātra ṣaḍrātraṃ prāpnoti sugatiṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11966: 03,129.001a asmin kila svayaṃ rājann iṣṭavān vai prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11968: 03,129.002a ambarīṣaś ca nābhāga iṣṭavān yamunām anu
GE07mbh_03_u:11969: 03,129.002c yajñaiś ca tapasā caiva parāṃ siddhim avāpa saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11971: 03,129.002d*0630_02 yeṣāṃ liṅgair mahārāja saṃstīrṇaiva ca bhūr iyam
GE07mbh_03_u:11972: 03,129.002d*0630_03 svayaṃ prakāśabahavo vṛkṣāś caite viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:11973: 03,129.002d*0630_04 devāś ca ṛṣayaś caiva samāgacchanti nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11974: 03,129.002d*0630_05 taptuṃ sāyaṃ tathā prātar dṛśyante te hutāśanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11978: 03,129.002d*0630_09 viśvāmitreṇa vai tatra tapas taptam anuttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:11979: 03,129.002d*0630_10 tatas tatra samāplutya gātrāṇi sagaṇo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:11981: 03,129.002d*0630_11 jagāma kauśikīṃ puṇyāṃ ramyāṃ sphītajalāṃ nadīm
GE07mbh_03_u:11982: 03,129.002d*0630_12 eṣaiva ca nadī puṇyā kauśikī nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:11991: 03,129.006a eṣā śamy ekapatrā sā śarakaṃ caitad uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:11997: 03,129.008d*0631_01 atra sthāsyanti ye nityaṃ teṣāṃ vighno bhaved iti
GE07mbh_03_u:11999: 03,129.009c tadvad bhūtilaye snātvā saputrā vastum icchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:12001: 03,129.010c etad vai te divā vṛttaṃ rātrau vṛttam ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_03_u:12002: 03,129.010d*0632_01 evam etad viditvā tvaṃ rātriṃ vasa mahāmate
GE07mbh_03_u:12004: 03,129.011c dvāram etad dhi kaunteya kurukṣetrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:12005: 03,129.012a atraiva nāhuṣo rājā rājan kratubhir iṣṭavān
GE07mbh_03_u:12008: 03,129.013c etad vai nākapṛṣṭhasya dvāram āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12011: 03,129.015a atraiva bharato rājā medhyam aśvam avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_03_u:12026: 03,129.020b*0634_01 iha snātvā tapoyuktāṃs trīṃl lokān sacarācarān
GE07mbh_03_u:12030: 03,129.021e ṛṣayaś caiva kaunteya tathā rājarṣayo 'pi ca
GE07mbh_03_u:12032: 03,129.022c kuror vai yajñaśīlasya kṣetram etan mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12034: 03,130.001a iha martyās tapas taptvā svargaṃ gacchanti bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:12036: 03,130.002a evam āśīḥ prayuktā hi dakṣeṇa yajatā purā
GE07mbh_03_u:12037: 03,130.002c iha ye vai mariṣyanti te vai svargajito narāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12038: 03,130.003a eṣā sarasvatī puṇyā divyā coghavatī nadī
GE07mbh_03_u:12039: 03,130.003c etad vinaśanaṃ nāma sarasvatyā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:12041: 03,130.004b*0635_01 kṣīṇapāpā śubhāṃl lokān prāpnute nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12042: 03,130.004c praviṣṭā pṛthivīṃ vīra mā niṣādā hi māṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12043: 03,130.005a eṣa vai camasodbhedo yatra dṛśyā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_03_u:12045: 03,130.006a etat sindhor mahat tīrthaṃ yatrāgastyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_03_u:12049: 03,130.008a etad viṣṇupadaṃ nāma dṛśyate tīrtham uttamam
GE07mbh_03_u:12052: 03,130.008b*0636_03 munīnām āśramāś caiva sarvāḥ svargamayāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12056: 03,130.008c eṣā ramyā vipāśā ca nadī paramapāvanī
GE07mbh_03_u:12065: 03,130.011c agneś cātraiva saṃvādaḥ kāśyapasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:12067: 03,130.012c varṣam asya girer madhye rāmeṇa śrīmatā kṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:12069: 03,130.013c nābhyavartata yad dvāraṃ videhān uttaraṃ ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12071: 03,130.013d*0639_02 kṣīṇe yuge 'pi kaunteya śarvasya saha pārṣadaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12073: 03,130.013d*0639_04 asmin sarasi ramye vai caitre māsi pinākinam
GE07mbh_03_u:12076: 03,130.013d*0639_07 kṣīṇapāpaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnute nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12077: 03,130.014a eṣa ujjānako nāma yavakrīr yatra śāntavān
GE07mbh_03_u:12079: 03,130.015a hradaś ca kuśavān eṣa yatra padmaṃ kuśeśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:12081: 03,130.016a samādhīnāṃ samāsas tu pāṇḍaveya śrutas tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:12083: 03,130.016d*0640_01 maṇḍavāṃ ca tathā saṃdhyāṃ drakṣyasy amitavikrama
GE07mbh_03_u:12084: 03,130.017a jalāṃ copajalāṃ caiva yamunām abhito nadīm
GE07mbh_03_u:12086: 03,130.018a tāṃ devasamitiṃ tasya vāsavaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:12087: 03,130.018c abhyagacchata rājānaṃ jñātum agniś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:12090: 03,130.020a ūruṃ rājñaḥ samāsādya kapotaḥ śyenajād bhayāt
GE07mbh_03_u:12092: 03,131.000*0641_01 śṛṇu tvaṃ tatra vai rājañ śyeno yad abhibhāṣata
GE07mbh_03_u:12094: 03,131.001a dharmātmānaṃ tv āhur ekaṃ sarve rājan mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12095: 03,131.001c sa vai dharmaviruddhaṃ tvaṃ kasmāt karma cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_03_u:12096: 03,131.002a vihitaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ rājan pīḍyamānasya me kṣudhā
GE07mbh_03_u:12097: 03,131.002c mā bhāṅkṣīr dharmalobhena dharmam utsṛṣṭavān asi
GE07mbh_03_u:12102: 03,131.004c apradāne paro 'dharmaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ śyena prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:12105: 03,131.005d*0642_01 yo hi kaś cid dvijān hanyād gāṃ vā lokasya mātaram
GE07mbh_03_u:12106: 03,131.005d*0642_02 śaraṇāgataṃ ca tyajate tulyaṃ teṣāṃ hi pātakam
GE07mbh_03_u:12113: 03,131.007c na tu bhojanam utsṛjya śakyaṃ vartayituṃ ciram
GE07mbh_03_u:12114: 03,131.008a bhakṣyād vilopitasyādya mama prāṇā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:12117: 03,131.009c rakṣamāṇaḥ kapotaṃ tvaṃ bahūn prāṇān naśiṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:12118: 03,131.010a dharmaṃ yo bādhate dharmo na sa dharmaḥ kudharma tat
GE07mbh_03_u:12119: 03,131.010c avirodhī tu yo dharmaḥ sa dharmaḥ satyavikrama
GE07mbh_03_u:12121: 03,131.011c na bādhā vidyate yatra taṃ dharmaṃ samudācaret
GE07mbh_03_u:12123: 03,131.012c yato bhūyāṃs tato rājan kuru dharmaviniścayam
GE07mbh_03_u:12126: 03,131.013c suparṇaḥ pakṣirāṭ kiṃ tvaṃ dharmajñaś cāsy asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_03_u:12127: 03,131.013e tathā hi dharmasaṃyuktaṃ bahu citraṃ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_03_u:12128: 03,131.014a na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid iti tvā lakṣayāmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:12129: 03,131.014c śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥ parityāgaṃ kathaṃ sādhv iti manyase
GE07mbh_03_u:12132: 03,131.015c śakyaś cāpy anyathā kartum āhāro 'py adhikas tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:12133: 03,131.016a govṛṣo vā varāho vā mṛgo vā mahiṣo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_03_u:12134: 03,131.016c tvadartham adya kriyatāṃ yad vānyad abhikāṅkṣase
GE07mbh_03_u:12136: 03,131.017a na varāhaṃ na cokṣāṇaṃ na mṛgān vividhāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:12137: 03,131.017c bhakṣayāmi mahārāja kim annādyena tena me
GE07mbh_03_u:12138: 03,131.018a yas tu me daivavihito bhakṣaḥ kṣatriyapuṃgava
GE07mbh_03_u:12139: 03,131.018c tam utsṛja mahīpāla kapotam imam eva me
GE07mbh_03_u:12140: 03,131.019a śyenāḥ kapotān khādanti sthitir eṣā sanātanī
GE07mbh_03_u:12141: 03,131.019c mā rājan mārgam ājñāya kadalīskandham āruha
GE07mbh_03_u:12143: 03,131.020a rājyaṃ śibīnām ṛddhaṃ vai śādhi pakṣigaṇārcita
GE07mbh_03_u:12144: 03,131.020b*0645_01 kṛtsnam etan mayā dattaṃ rājavad vihagottama
GE07mbh_03_u:12145: 03,131.020c yad vā kāmayase kiṃ cic chyena sarvaṃ dadāni te
GE07mbh_03_u:12148: 03,131.021c tad ācakṣva kariṣyāmi na hi dāsye kapotakam
GE07mbh_03_u:12150: 03,131.022a uśīnara kapote te yadi sneho narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:12152: 03,131.023a yadā samaṃ kapotena tava māṃsaṃ bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:12153: 03,131.023c tadā pradeyaṃ tan mahyaṃ sā me tuṣṭir bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:12155: 03,131.024a anugraham imaṃ manye śyena yan mābhiyācase
GE07mbh_03_u:12156: 03,131.024c tasmāt te 'dya pradāsyāmi svamāṃsaṃ tulayā dhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:12158: 03,131.024d*0646_02 tataḥ kim upacāro 'sya pratyahe kriyate vṛthā
GE07mbh_03_u:12163: 03,131.026c punaś cotkṛtya māṃsāni rājā prādād uśīnaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12164: 03,131.027a na vidyate yadā māṃsaṃ kapotena samaṃ dhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:12167: 03,131.028a indro 'ham asmi dharmajña kapoto havyavāḍ ayam
GE07mbh_03_u:12169: 03,131.029a yat te māṃsāni gātrebhya utkṛttāni viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_03_u:12170: 03,131.029c eṣā te bhāsvarī kīrtir lokān abhibhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:12171: 03,131.030a yāval loke manuṣyās tvāṃ kathayiṣyanti pārthiva
GE07mbh_03_u:12172: 03,131.030c tāvat kīrtiś ca lokāś ca sthāsyanti tava śāśvatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12173: 03,131.030d*0647_01 ity evam uktvā rājānam āruroha divaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12177: 03,131.031*0648_01 ity uktvā taṃ dānapatim indrāgnī tau tadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:12179: 03,131.031a tat pāṇḍaveya sadanaṃ rājñas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12181: 03,131.032a atra vai satataṃ devā munayaś ca sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12212: tat sarvaṃ me lomaśa śaṃsa tattvam
GE07mbh_03_u:12218: 03,132.007a taṃ vai viprāḥ paryabhavaṃś ca śiṣyās;
GE07mbh_03_u:12219: taṃ ca jñātvā viprakāraṃ guruḥ saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12222: 03,132.007c tasmai prādāt sadya eva śrutaṃ ca;
GE07mbh_03_u:12223: bhāryāṃ ca vai duhitaraṃ svāṃ sujātām
GE07mbh_03_u:12246: 03,132.012c na cāsti te vasu kiṃ cit prajātā;
GE07mbh_03_u:12248: 03,132.013a uktas tv evaṃ bhāryayā vai kahoḍo;
GE07mbh_03_u:12256: 03,132.015a rarakṣa sā cāpy ati taṃ sumantraṃ;

GE07mbh_03_u:12277: śivaś ca saumyaś ca hi brahmaghoṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12306: 03,133.004d*0654_01 mā ca tvam āvāṃ vyādhinā tapyamānāv
GE07mbh_03_u:12313: 03,133.005c na vai bālāḥ praviśanty atra viprā;
GE07mbh_03_u:12340: 03,133.011a na tena sthaviro bhavati yenāsya palitaṃ śiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12341: 03,133.011c bālo 'pi yaḥ prajānāti taṃ devāḥ sthaviraṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12342: 03,133.012a na hāyanair na palitair na vittena na bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:12343: 03,133.012c ṛṣayaś cakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān
GE07mbh_03_u:12349: 03,133.014b*0655_02 saha vāde vivṛddhe tu bandinaṃ cāpi nirjitam
GE07mbh_03_u:12363: 03,133.015d*0658_04 praveśane yac ca kiṃ cit taveṣṭam
GE07mbh_03_u:12397: 03,133.021c yas triṣaṣṭiśatārasya vedārthaṃ sa paraḥ kaviḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:16696: 03,177.011a ṣaṣṭhe kāle mamāhāraḥ prāpto 'yam anujas tava
GE07mbh_03_u:16697: 03,177.011c nāham enaṃ vimokṣyāmi na cānyam abhikāmaye
GE07mbh_03_u:16698: 03,177.012a praśnān uccāritāṃs tu tvaṃ vyāhariṣyasi cen mama
GE07mbh_03_u:16699: 03,177.012c atha paścād vimokṣyāmi bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_03_u:16701: 03,177.013a brūhi sarpa yathākāmaṃ prativakṣyāmi te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16702: 03,177.013c api cec chaknuyāṃ prītim āhartuṃ te bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_03_u:16703: 03,177.014a vedyaṃ yad brāhmaṇeneha tad bhavān vetti kevalam
GE07mbh_03_u:16704: 03,177.014b*0884_01 brūhi yat te mayā vācyaṃ tattvaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:16705: 03,177.014c sarparāja tataḥ śrutvā prativakṣyāmi te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16707: 03,177.014d@019_0001 dharmaṃ sarve praśaṃsanti devā brahmarṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:16710: 03,177.014d@019_0003 satyaṃ damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ saṃtoṣo hrīḥ kṣamārjavam
GE07mbh_03_u:16712: 03,177.014d@019_0004 jñānaṃ śamo dayā dhyānam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16713: 03,177.014d@019_0005 kiṃ satyaṃ procyate rājan ko damaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16715: 03,177.014d@019_0006 tapaso lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ syāt kiṃ tac chaucam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:16716: 03,177.014d@019_0007 satyaṃ bhūtahitaṃ proktaṃ manaso damanaṃ damaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16719: 03,177.014d@019_0009 saṃtoṣaḥ kaḥ paraḥ proktaḥ kā ca hrīḥ parikīrtitā
GE07mbh_03_u:16721: 03,177.014d@019_0010 kṣamā ca kā parā proktā kiṃ cārjavam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:16725: 03,177.014d@019_0013 kiṃ jñānaṃ procyate rājan kaḥ śamaś ca prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16726: 03,177.014d@019_0014 dayā ca kā parā proktā kiṃ ca dhyānam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:16731: 03,177.014d@019_0017 kaḥ śatrur durjayaḥ puṃsāṃ kaś ca vyādhir anantakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16733: 03,177.014d@019_0018 kīdṛśaś ca smṛtaḥ sādhur asādhuḥ kīdṛśaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16734: 03,177.014d@019_0019 krodhas tu durjayaḥ śatrur lobho vyādhir anantakaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16737: 03,177.014d@019_0021 ko mohaḥ procyate rājan kaś ca mānaḥ prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16739: 03,177.014d@019_0022 kim ālasyaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ kaś ca śoka ihocyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16743: 03,177.014d@019_0025 kiṃ sthairyaṃ munibhiḥ proktaṃ kiṃ tad dhairyam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:16744: 03,177.014d@019_0026 snānaṃ ca kiṃ paraṃ proktaṃ kiṃ tad dānam ihocyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16749: 03,177.014d@019_0029 kaḥ paṇḍitaḥ pumāñ jñeyaḥ kaś ca mūrkho janeśvara
GE07mbh_03_u:16751: 03,177.014d@019_0030 saṃsārahetuḥ kaś cāsya hṛttāpaḥ kaḥ paras tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:16752: 03,177.014d@019_0031 dharmātmā paṇḍito jñeyo nāstiko mūrkha ucyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16753: 03,177.014d@019_0032 kāmaḥ saṃsārahetuś ca hṛttāpo matsaraḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16755: 03,177.014d@019_0033 ko 'haṃkāra iti proktaḥ kaś cid dambho janeśvara
GE07mbh_03_u:16757: 03,177.014d@019_0034 abhyasūyā ca kā proktā kiṃ tat paiśunyam ucyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16760: 03,177.014d@019_0036 dharmadveṣo hy asūyā ca paiśunyaṃ paradūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:16761: 03,177.014d@019_0037 dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca parasparavirodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16762: 03,177.014d@019_0038 teṣāṃ nityavirodhitvāt kva nu syāt saṃgataṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_03_u:16764: 03,177.014d@019_0039 saṃtuṣṭo bhāryayā bhartā bhartrā bhāryā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:16765: 03,177.014d@019_0040 yasminn etat kule nityaṃ kalyāṇaṃ tatra vai dhruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:16766: 03,177.014d@019_0041 yadā bhartā ca bhāryā ca parasparavaśānugau
GE07mbh_03_u:16769: 03,177.014d@019_0043 jātyā kulena vṛttena svādhyāyena śrutena ca
GE07mbh_03_u:16770: 03,177.014d@019_0044 brāhmaṇyaṃ kena bhavati prabrūhy etad viniścayam
GE07mbh_03_u:16772: 03,177.014d@019_0045 na jātir na kulaṃ tāta na svādhyāyaḥ śrutaṃ na ca
GE07mbh_03_u:16773: 03,177.014d@019_0046 kāraṇāni dvijatvasya vṛttam eva tu kāraṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:16777: 03,177.014d@019_0050 tenādhītaṃ śrutaṃ tena yo vṛttam anutiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_03_u:16778: 03,177.014d@019_0051 kapālasthaṃ yathā toyaṃ śvadṛtau ca yathā payaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16779: 03,177.014d@019_0052 duṣṭaṃ syāt sthānadoṣeṇa vṛttahīne tathā śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:16780: 03,177.014d@019_0053 vṛttaṃ yatnena rakṣyaṃ syād vittam eti ca yāti ca
GE07mbh_03_u:16781: 03,177.014d@019_0054 akṣīṇo vittataḥ kṣīṇo vṛttatas tu hato hataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16783: 03,177.014d@019_0056 kṛmayaḥ kiṃ na jāyante kusumeṣu sugandhiṣu
GE07mbh_03_u:16787: 03,177.014d@019_0060 tapaḥsvādhyāyaśīlaś ca taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16789: 03,177.014d@019_0062 sarvabhūtahito maitras taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16790: 03,177.014d@019_0063 yena kena cid ācchanno yena kena cid āsitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16791: 03,177.014d@019_0064 yatrakvacanaśāyī ca taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16792: 03,177.014d@019_0065 yo 'her iva gaṇād bhīto sanmānān maraṇād iva
GE07mbh_03_u:16793: 03,177.014d@019_0066 kuṇapād iva ca strībhyas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16795: 03,177.015a brāhmaṇaḥ ko bhaved rājan vedyaṃ kiṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:16796: 03,177.015c bravīhy atimatiṃ tvāṃ hi vākyair anumimīmahe
GE07mbh_03_u:16798: 03,177.016a satyaṃ dānaṃ kṣamā śīlam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damo ghṛṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:16799: 03,177.016c dṛśyante yatra nāgendra sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16801: 03,177.016d*0885_02 sato 'pi doṣān rājendra na gṛhṇāti kadā cana
GE07mbh_03_u:16804: 03,177.016d*0885_04 nityaṃ dānarataś caiva taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16805: 03,177.016d*0885_05 yatnena brūhi rājendra kaḥ kālaḥ śrāddhadānayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16807: 03,177.016d*0885_06 praśnaṃ praśnavidāṃ śreṣṭha sarvavit tvaṃ mato 'si me
GE07mbh_03_u:16808: 03,177.016d*0885_07 yatra vai brāhmaṇaṃ paśyec chrotriyaṃ dhyānatatparam
GE07mbh_03_u:16810: 03,177.016d*0885_08 dhanaṃ manyed viśiṣṭaṃ tu sa kālaḥ śrāddhadānayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16811: 03,177.016d*0885_09 kiṃ vedyaṃ paramaṃ rājañ śaṃsa me tvaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:16813: 03,177.017a vedyaṃ sarpa paraṃ brahma nirduḥkham asukhaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_03_u:16814: 03,177.017c yatra gatvā na śocanti bhavataḥ kiṃ vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_03_u:16816: 03,177.018a cāturvarṇyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca satyaṃ ca brahma caiva ha
GE07mbh_03_u:16817: 03,177.018c śūdreṣv api ca satyaṃ ca dānam akrodha eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:16818: 03,177.018e ānṛśaṃsyam ahiṃsā ca ghṛṇā caiva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_03_u:16819: 03,177.019a vedyaṃ yac cāttha nirduḥkham asukhaṃ ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:16820: 03,177.019c tābhyāṃ hīnaṃ padaṃ cānyan na tad astīti lakṣaye
GE07mbh_03_u:16821: 03,177.019d*0886_01 tāṃś ca sarvān aśeṣeṇa kathayasva narādhipa
GE07mbh_03_u:16823: 03,177.020a śūdre caitad bhavel lakṣyaṃ dvije tac ca na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16824: 03,177.020c na vai śūdro bhavec chūdro brāhmaṇo na ca brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16825: 03,177.021a yatraital lakṣyate sarpa vṛttaṃ sa brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16826: 03,177.021c yatraitan na bhavet sarpa taṃ śūdram iti nirdiśet
GE07mbh_03_u:16827: 03,177.022a yat punar bhavatā proktaṃ na vedyaṃ vidyateti ha
GE07mbh_03_u:16828: 03,177.022c tābhyāṃ hīnam atītyātra padaṃ nāstīti ced api
GE07mbh_03_u:16829: 03,177.023a evam etan mataṃ sarpa tābhyāṃ hīnaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16830: 03,177.023c yathā śītoṣṇayor madhye bhaven noṣṇaṃ na śītatā
GE07mbh_03_u:16831: 03,177.024a evaṃ vai sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ hīnam asti padaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:16832: 03,177.024c eṣā mama matiḥ sarpa yathā vā manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:16834: 03,177.025a yadi te vṛttato rājan brāhmaṇaḥ prasamīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16835: 03,177.025c vyarthā jātis tadāyuṣman kṛtir yāvan na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16839: 03,177.027a sarve sarvāsv apatyāni janayanti yadā narāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16840: 03,177.027c vāṅ maithunam atho janma maraṇaṃ ca samaṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_03_u:16841: 03,177.028a idam ārṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca ye yajāmaha ity api
GE07mbh_03_u:16842: 03,177.028c tasmāc chīlaṃ pradhāneṣṭaṃ vidur ye tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16844: 03,177.029b*0887_01 tatas tu nāmakaraṇaṃ tataś caulaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16846: 03,177.029c tatrāsya mātā sāvitrī pitā tv ācārya ucyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16847: 03,177.030a vṛttyā śūdrasamo hy eṣa yāvad vede na jāyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16849: 03,177.031a kṛtakṛtyāḥ punar varṇā yadi vṛttaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16852: 03,177.032c taṃ brāhmaṇam ahaṃ pūrvam uktavān bhujagottama
GE07mbh_03_u:16855: 03,177.033c bhakṣayeyam ahaṃ kasmād bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_03_u:16858: 03,178.001c brūhi kiṃ kurvataḥ karma bhaved gatir anuttamā
GE07mbh_03_u:16860: 03,178.002a pātre dattvā priyāṇy uktvā satyam uktvā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:16861: 03,178.002c ahiṃsānirataḥ svargaṃ gacched iti matir mama
GE07mbh_03_u:16863: 03,178.003a dānād vā sarpa satyād vā kim ato guru dṛśyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16866: 03,178.004a dāne ratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca ahiṃsā priyam eva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:16868: 03,178.005a kasmāc cid dānayogād dhi satyam eva viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16869: 03,178.005c satyavākyāc ca rājendra kiṃ cid dānaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16871: 03,178.006c ahiṃsā dṛśyate gurvī tataś ca priyam iṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16872: 03,178.007a evam etad bhaved rājan kāryāpekṣam anantaram
GE07mbh_03_u:16873: 03,178.007c yad abhipretam anyat te brūhi yāvad bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:16875: 03,178.008a kathaṃ svarge gatiḥ sarpa karmaṇāṃ ca phalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:16876: 03,178.008c aśarīrasya dṛśyeta viṣayāṃś ca bravīhi me
GE07mbh_03_u:16878: 03,178.009a tisro vai gatayo rājan paridṛṣṭāḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16879: 03,178.009c mānuṣyaṃ svargavāsaś ca tiryagyoniś ca tat tridhā
GE07mbh_03_u:16880: 03,178.010a tatra vai mānuṣāl lokād dānādibhir atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16882: 03,178.011a viparītaiś ca rājendra kāraṇair mānuṣo bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:16883: 03,178.011c tiryagyonis tathā tāta viśeṣaś cātra vakṣyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16888: 03,178.014a so 'yam etā gatīḥ sarvā jantuś carati kāryavān
GE07mbh_03_u:16890: 03,178.015a jāto jātaś ca balavān bhuṅkte cātmā sa dehavān
GE07mbh_03_u:16893: 03,178.016a śabde sparśe ca rūpe ca tathaiva rasagandhayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16895: 03,178.017a kiṃ na gṛhṇāsi viṣayān yugapat tvaṃ mahāmate
GE07mbh_03_u:16900: 03,178.019a jñānaṃ caivātra buddhiś ca manaś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:16902: 03,178.020a manasā tāta paryeti kramaśo viṣayān imān
GE07mbh_03_u:16904: 03,178.021a atra cāpi naravyāghra mano jantor vidhīyate
GE07mbh_03_u:16906: 03,178.022a sa ātmā puruṣavyāghra bhruvor antaram āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16908: 03,178.023a buddher uttarakālaṃ ca vedanā dṛśyate budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16911: 03,178.024a manasaś cāpi buddheś ca brūhi me lakṣaṇaṃ param
GE07mbh_03_u:16915: 03,178.025c tadāśritā hi saṃjñaiṣā vidhis tasyaiṣaṇe bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:16916: 03,178.026a buddher guṇavidhir nāsti manas tu guṇavad bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:16917: 03,178.026c buddhir utpadyate kārye manas tūtpannam eva hi
GE07mbh_03_u:16919: 03,178.027c tvam apy atrābhisaṃbuddhaḥ kathaṃ vā manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:16921: 03,178.028a aho buddhimatāṃ śreṣṭha śubhā buddhir iyaṃ tava
GE07mbh_03_u:16922: 03,178.028c viditaṃ veditavyaṃ te kasmān mām anupṛcchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:16924: 03,178.028d@020_0001 uktās te sarvaśas tāta praśnāḥ praśnavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_03_u:16926: 03,178.028d@020_0002 idānīm eṣa muñcāmi bhrātaraṃ te vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_03_u:16927: 03,178.028d@020_0003 nahuṣeṇa tato muktaṃ bhīmam āśliṣya sodaram
GE07mbh_03_u:16931: 03,178.028d@020_0007 saṃbhāṣyaṃ sādhubhiḥ puṇyam iti vai vaidikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16932: 03,178.028d@020_0008 sarpatvāt paśya mukto 'haṃ tvayā saṃbhāṣya sādhunā
GE07mbh_03_u:16933: 03,178.028d@020_0009 dharmaṃ kila narāḥ kṛtvā labhante satsutān iha
GE07mbh_03_u:16934: 03,178.028d@020_0010 dharmeṇa kaḥ kṛto dharmo yena labdho bhavān sutaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16935: 03,178.028d@020_0011 na kevalaṃ prajā dhanyā yāsāṃ rājan nṛpo bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:16936: 03,178.028d@020_0012 dharmo 'pi dhanyo dharmajña yasya putras tvam īdṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16937: 03,178.028d@020_0013 dṛṣṭāḥ śrutāś ca bahavo nṛpā dharmaparāyaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16939: 03,178.028d@020_0014 na śruto na ca dṛṣṭo me dharmajñas tvādṛśo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16940: 03,178.028d@020_0015 sabhāgyo 'haṃ mahābhāga yasya tuṣṭo bhavān guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16942: 03,178.028d@020_0017 kiṃ tu kautūhalaṃ tāta mama pārthivasattama
GE07mbh_03_u:16943: 03,178.028d@020_0018 ataḥ pṛcchāmi sauhārdāt tvām ahaṃ nābhyasūyayā
GE07mbh_03_u:16946: 03,178.028d@020_0020 kathaṃ tvām āviśan mohaḥ prākṛtaṃ puruṣaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:16948: 03,178.028d@020_0022 suprājñam api kaunteya ṛddhir mohayate naram
GE07mbh_03_u:16949: 03,178.028d@020_0023 hīnābhijanavṛtto 'pi na sa rājāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_03_u:16950: 03,178.028d@020_0024 yasya cetasi rājendra karoti na madaḥ padam
GE07mbh_03_u:16951: 03,178.028d@020_0025 yathāgnau dhruvam uṣṇatvam anile calanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:16952: 03,178.028d@020_0026 yathā śaśini śītatvaṃ tathaiśvarye dhruvo madaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16953: 03,178.028d@020_0027 aiśvaryatimiraṃ cakṣur na tat paśyati nirmalam
GE07mbh_03_u:16955: 03,178.028d@020_0029 vartamānaḥ sukhe svarge nāvaitīti matir mama
GE07mbh_03_u:16958: 03,178.028d@020_0032 lokadvayahitaṃ vaktuṃ jñātuṃ ko vā na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16961: 03,178.028d@020_0035 guhyam etan mahābāho kathitaṃ te mayākhilam
GE07mbh_03_u:16964: 03,178.028d@020_0038 yaiḥ kṛtaḥ sarvabhakṣo 'gnir apeyaś ca mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16965: 03,178.028d@020_0039 kṣayī cāpāditaś candraḥ ko na naśyet prakopya tān
GE07mbh_03_u:16966: 03,178.028d@020_0040 lokān anyān sṛjeyur ye lokapālāṃś ca kopitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16967: 03,178.028d@020_0041 devān kuryur adevāṃś ca kaḥ kṣuṇvaṃs tān samṛdhnuyāt
GE07mbh_03_u:16968: 03,178.028d@020_0042 yān upāśritya tiṣṭhanti lokā devāś ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_03_u:16969: 03,178.028d@020_0043 brahma caiva dhanaṃ yeṣāṃ ko hiṃsyāt tāñ jijīviṣuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:16970: 03,178.028d@020_0044 praṇītaś cāpraṇītaś ca yathāgnir daivataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:16971: 03,178.028d@020_0045 evaṃ vidvān avidvāṃś ca brāhmaṇo daivataṃ param
GE07mbh_03_u:16972: 03,178.029a sarvajñaṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ moha āviśat svargavāsinam

GE07mbh_03_u:18389: 03,189.011a narā dāneṣu niratā vrateṣu niyameṣu ca

GE07mbh_03_u:18444: 03,189.031a tathā kathāṃ śubhāṃ śrutvā mārkaṇḍeyasya dhīmataḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:23711: 03,246.012c vikacaḥ paruṣā vāco vyāharan vividhā muniḥ

GE07mbh_03_u:23851: 03,247.039c svargabhājaś cyavantīha tasmāt svargaṃ na kāmaye
GE07mbh_03_u:23852: 03,247.040a yatra gatvā na śocanti na vyathanti calanti vā
GE07mbh_03_u:23853: 03,247.040c tad ahaṃ sthānam atyantaṃ mārgayiṣyāmi kevalam
GE07mbh_03_u:23855: 03,247.040d*1193_01 mahāntas tu amī doṣās tvayā svargasya kīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23857: 03,247.040d*1193_02 nirdoṣa eva yas tv anyo lokaṃ taṃ pravadasva me
GE07mbh_03_u:23858: 03,247.040d*1193_03 brahmaṇaḥ sadanād ūrdhvaṃ tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_03_u:23859: 03,247.040d*1193_04 śuddhaṃ sanātanaṃ jyotiḥ paraṃ brahmeti yad viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23860: 03,247.040d*1193_05 na tatra vipra gacchanti puruṣā viṣayātmakāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23864: 03,247.041a ity uktvā sa munir vākyaṃ devadūtaṃ visṛjya tam
GE07mbh_03_u:23870: 03,247.043a dhyānayogād balaṃ labdhvā prāpya carddhim anuttamām
GE07mbh_03_u:23872: 03,247.044a tasmāt tvam api kaunteya na śokaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:23873: 03,247.044c rājyāt sphītāt paribhraṣṭas tapasā tad avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:23877: 03,247.046c varṣāt trayodaśād ūrdhvaṃ vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23879: 03,247.047a evam uktvā sa bhagavān vyāsaḥ pāṇḍavanandanam
GE07mbh_03_u:23880: 03,247.047c jagāma tapase dhīmān punar evāśramaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:23882: 03,247.047d@025_0001 vasatsv evaṃ vane teṣu pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu
GE07mbh_03_u:23886: 03,247.047d@025_0005 āraṇyānāṃ mṛgāṇāṃ ca māṃsair nānāvidhair api
GE07mbh_03_u:23889: 03,247.047d@025_0008 duḥśāsanasya karṇasya śakuneś ca mate sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23892: 03,247.047d@025_0010 śrutvā teṣāṃ tathā vṛttiṃ nagare vasatām iva
GE07mbh_03_u:23901: 03,247.047d@025_0019 vidhivat pūjayām āsa svayaṃ kiṃkaravat sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23902: 03,247.047d@025_0020 ahāni kati cit tatra tasthau sa munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23903: 03,247.047d@025_0021 taṃ ca paryacarad rājā divārātram atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23906: 03,247.047d@025_0024 ity uktvā gacchati snātuṃ pratyāgacchati vai cirāt
GE07mbh_03_u:23907: 03,247.047d@025_0025 na bhokṣyāmy adya me nāsti kṣudhety uktvaity adarśanam
GE07mbh_03_u:23908: 03,247.047d@025_0026 akasmād etya ca brūte bhojayāsmāṃs tvarānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23909: 03,247.047d@025_0027 kadā cic ca niśīthe sa utthāya nikṛtau sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23910: 03,247.047d@025_0028 pūrvavat kārayitvānnaṃ na bhuṅkte garhayan sma saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23911: 03,247.047d@025_0029 vartamāne tathā tasmin yadā duryodhano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23912: 03,247.047d@025_0030 vikṛtiṃ naiti na krodhaṃ tadā tuṣṭo 'bhavan muniḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23914: 03,247.047d@025_0032 varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yat te manasi vartate
GE07mbh_03_u:23915: 03,247.047d@025_0033 mayi prīte tu yad dharmyaṃ nālabhyaṃ vidyate tava
GE07mbh_03_u:23916: 03,247.047d@025_0034 etac chrutvā vacas tasya maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23917: 03,247.047d@025_0035 amanyata punar jātam ātmānaṃ sa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23919: 03,247.047d@025_0037 yācanīyaṃ munes tuṣṭād iti niścitya durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23921: 03,247.047d@025_0039 śiṣyaiḥ saha mama brahman yathā jāto 'tithir bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:23924: 03,247.047d@025_0042 guṇavāñ śīlasaṃpannas tasya tvam atithir bhava
GE07mbh_03_u:23925: 03,247.047d@025_0043 yadā ca rājaputrī sā sukumārī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:23926: 03,247.047d@025_0044 bhojayitvā dvijān sarvān patīṃś ca varavarṇinī
GE07mbh_03_u:23927: 03,247.047d@025_0045 viśrāntā ca svayaṃ bhuktvā sukhāsīnā bhaved yadā
GE07mbh_03_u:23928: 03,247.047d@025_0046 tadā tvaṃ tatra gacchethā yady anugrāhyatā mayi
GE07mbh_03_u:23929: 03,247.047d@025_0047 tathā kariṣye tvatprītyety evam uktvā suyodhanam
GE07mbh_03_u:23930: 03,247.047d@025_0048 durvāsā api viprendro yathāgatam agāt tataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23931: 03,247.047d@025_0049 kṛtārtham iva cātmānaṃ tadā mene suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23932: 03,247.047d@025_0050 kareṇa ca karaṃ gṛhya karṇasya mudito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:23933: 03,247.047d@025_0051 karṇo 'pi bhrātṛsahitam ity uvāca nṛpaṃ mudā
GE07mbh_03_u:23934: 03,247.047d@025_0052 diṣṭyā kāmaḥ susaṃvṛtto diṣṭyā kaurava vardhase
GE07mbh_03_u:23935: 03,247.047d@025_0053 diṣṭyā te śatravo magnā dustare vyasanārṇave
GE07mbh_03_u:23937: 03,247.047d@025_0055 svair eva te mahāpāpair gatā vai dustaraṃ tamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23940: 03,247.047d@025_0057 hasantaḥ prītamanaso jagmuḥ svaṃ svaṃ niketanam
GE07mbh_03_u:23941: 03,247.047d@025_0058 tataḥ kadā cid durvāsāḥ sukhāsīnāṃs tu pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_03_u:23942: 03,247.047d@025_0059 bhuktvā cāvasthitāṃ kṛṣṇāṃ jñātvā tasmin vane muniḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23944: 03,247.047d@025_0061 dṛṣṭvāyāntaṃ tam atithiṃ sa ca rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23948: 03,247.047d@025_0065 āhnikaṃ bhagavan kṛtvā śīghram ehīti cābravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:23949: 03,247.047d@025_0066 jagāma ca muniḥ so 'pi snātuṃ śiṣyaiḥ sahānaghaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23950: 03,247.047d@025_0067 bhojayet saha śiṣyaṃ māṃ katham ity avicintayan
GE07mbh_03_u:23952: 03,247.047d@025_0069 etasminn antare rājan draupadī yoṣitāṃ varā
GE07mbh_03_u:23954: 03,247.047d@025_0071 sā cintayantī ca yadā nānnahetum avindata
GE07mbh_03_u:23960: 03,247.047d@025_0077 ākūtīnāṃ ca cittīnāṃ pravartaka natāsmi te
GE07mbh_03_u:23963: 03,247.047d@025_0080 sarvādhyakṣa parādhyakṣa tvām ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā
GE07mbh_03_u:23967: 03,247.047d@025_0084 tvam ādir anto bhūtānāṃ tvam eva ca parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:23969: 03,247.047d@025_0086 tvām evāhuḥ paraṃ bījaṃ nidhānaṃ sarvasaṃpadām
GE07mbh_03_u:23970: 03,247.047d@025_0087 tvayā nāthena deveśa sarvāpadbhyo bhayaṃ na hi
GE07mbh_03_u:23971: 03,247.047d@025_0088 duḥśāsanād ahaṃ pūrvaṃ sabhāyāṃ mocitā yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:23972: 03,247.047d@025_0089 tathaiva saṃkaṭād asmān mām uddhartum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:23973: 03,247.047d@025_0090 evaṃ stutas tadā devaḥ kṛṣṇayā bhaktavatsalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23975: 03,247.047d@025_0092 pārśvasthāṃ śayane tyaktvā rukmiṇīṃ keśavaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23977: 03,247.047d@025_0094 tatas taṃ draupadī dṛṣṭvā praṇamya parayā mudā
GE07mbh_03_u:23979: 03,247.047d@025_0096 tatas tām abravīt kṛṣṇaḥ kṣudhito 'smi bhṛśāturaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23980: 03,247.047d@025_0097 śīghraṃ bhojaya māṃ kṛṣṇe paścāt sarvaṃ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:23981: 03,247.047d@025_0098 niśamya tadvacaḥ kṛṣṇā lajjitā vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:23983: 03,247.047d@025_0100 bhuktavaty asmy ahaṃ deva tasmād annaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_03_u:23986: 03,247.047d@025_0103 śīghraṃ gaccha mama sthālīm ānayitvā pradarśaya
GE07mbh_03_u:23987: 03,247.047d@025_0104 iti nirbandhataḥ sthālīm ānāyya sa yadūdvahaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23988: 03,247.047d@025_0105 sthālyāḥ kaṇṭhe 'tha saṃlagnaṃ śākānnaṃ vīkṣya keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23990: 03,247.047d@025_0107 viśvātmā prīyatāṃ devas tuṣṭaś cāstv iti yajñabhuk
GE07mbh_03_u:23998: 03,247.047d@025_0115 rājñā hi kārayitvānnaṃ vayaṃ snātuṃ samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:23999: 03,247.047d@025_0116 ākaṇṭhatṛptā viprarṣe kiṃ svid bhuñjāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_03_u:24001: 03,247.047d@025_0117 vṛthā pākaḥ kṛto 'smābhis tatra kiṃ karavāmahe
GE07mbh_03_u:24007: 03,247.047d@025_0123 śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca vratinas tapasi sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24009: 03,247.047d@025_0125 kruddhās te nirdaheyur vai tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24011: 03,247.047d@025_0126 tata etān apṛṣṭvaiva śiṣyāḥ śīghraṃ palāyata
GE07mbh_03_u:24012: 03,247.047d@025_0127 ity uktās te dvijāḥ sarve muninā guruṇā tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:24013: 03,247.047d@025_0128 pāṇḍavebhyo bhṛśaṃ bhītā dudruvus te diśo daśa
GE07mbh_03_u:24015: 03,247.047d@025_0130 tīrtheṣv itas tatas tasyā vicacāra gaveṣayan
GE07mbh_03_u:24016: 03,247.047d@025_0131 tatrasthebhyas tāpasebhyaḥ śrutvā tāṃś caiva vidrutān
GE07mbh_03_u:24022: 03,247.047d@025_0137 iti cintāparān dṛṣṭvā niḥśvasanto muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24023: 03,247.047d@025_0138 uvāca vacanaṃ śrīmān kṛṣṇaḥ pratyakṣatāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24026: 03,247.047d@025_0140 draupadyā cintitaḥ pārthā ahaṃ satvaram āgataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24027: 03,247.047d@025_0141 na bhayaṃ vidyate tasmād ṛṣer durvāsaso 'lpakam
GE07mbh_03_u:24028: 03,247.047d@025_0142 tejasā bhavatāṃ bhītaḥ pūrvam eva palāyitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24029: 03,247.047d@025_0143 dharmanityās tu ye ke cin na te sīdanti karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:24031: 03,247.047d@025_0144 āpṛcche vo gamiṣyāmi niyataṃ bhadram astu vaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24033: 03,247.047d@025_0146 draupadyā sahitāḥ pārthās tam ūcur vigatajvarāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24034: 03,247.047d@025_0147 tvayā nāthena govinda dustarām āpadaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_03_u:24036: 03,247.047d@025_0149 svasti sādhaya bhadraṃ te ity ājñāto yayau purīm
GE07mbh_03_u:24037: 03,247.047d@025_0150 pāṇḍavāś ca mahābhāga draupadyā sahitāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_03_u:24039: 03,247.047d@025_0152 iti te 'bhihitaṃ rājan yat pṛṣṭo 'ham iha tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:24048: 03,248.003c vijahrur indrapratimāḥ kaṃ cit kālam ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24049: 03,248.004a tatas te yaugapadyena yayuḥ sarve caturdiśam
GE07mbh_03_u:24053: 03,248.006a tatas tu rājā sindhūnāṃ vārddhakṣatrir mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24056: 03,248.007c rājabhir bahubhiḥ sārdham upāyāt kāmyakaṃ ca saḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24061: 03,248.010a apsarā devakanyā vā māyā vā devanirmitā
GE07mbh_03_u:24062: 03,248.010c iti kṛtvāñjaliṃ sarve dadṛśus tām aninditām
GE07mbh_03_u:24063: 03,248.011a tataḥ sa rājā sindhūnāṃ vārddhakṣatrir jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24066: 03,248.012c kasya tv eṣānavadyāṅgī yadi vāpi na mānuṣī
GE07mbh_03_u:24067: 03,248.013a vivāhārtho na me kaś cid imāṃ dṛṣṭvātisundarīm
GE07mbh_03_u:24068: 03,248.013c etām evāham ādāya gamiṣyāmi svam ālayam
GE07mbh_03_u:24069: 03,248.014a gaccha jānīhi saumyaināṃ kasya kā ca kuto 'pi vā
GE07mbh_03_u:24070: 03,248.014c kimartham āgatā subhrūr idaṃ kaṇṭakitaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_03_u:24071: 03,248.015a api nāma varārohā mām eṣā lokasundarī
GE07mbh_03_u:24073: 03,248.016a apy ahaṃ kṛtakāmaḥ syām imāṃ prāpya varastriyam
GE07mbh_03_u:24074: 03,248.016c gaccha jānīhi ko nv asyā nātha ity eva koṭika
GE07mbh_03_u:24075: 03,248.017a sa koṭikāśyas tac chrutvā rathāt praskandya kuṇḍalī
GE07mbh_03_u:24076: 03,248.017c upetya papraccha tadā kroṣṭā vyāghravadhūm iva
GE07mbh_03_u:24083: na cāpy araṇyeṣu bibheṣi kiṃ nu
GE07mbh_03_u:24084: 03,249.002c devī nu yakṣī yadi dānavī vā;
GE07mbh_03_u:24092: 03,249.004c na hy eva naḥ pṛcchasi ye vayaṃ sma;
GE07mbh_03_u:24096: 03,249.005c ācakṣva bandhūṃś ca patiṃ kulaṃ ca;
GE07mbh_03_u:24144: anyo naro vāpy atha vāpi nārī
GE07mbh_03_u:24145: 03,250.003a ekā hy ahaṃ saṃprati tena vācaṃ;
GE07mbh_03_u:24147: 03,250.003c ahaṃ hy araṇye katham ekam ekā;
GE07mbh_03_u:24175: 03,251.001b*1197_01 yad uktaṃ kṛṣṇayā sārdhaṃ tat sarvaṃ pratyavedayat
GE07mbh_03_u:24179: 03,251.002a yadā vācaṃ vyāharantyām asyāṃ me ramate manaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24181: 03,251.003a etāṃ dṛṣṭvā striyo me 'nyā yathā śākhāmṛgastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24182: 03,251.003c pratibhānti mahābāho satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_03_u:24183: 03,251.004a darśanād eva hi manas tayā me 'pahṛtaṃ bhṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:24184: 03,251.004c tāṃ samācakṣva kalyāṇīṃ yadi syāc chaibya mānuṣī
GE07mbh_03_u:24186: 03,251.005a eṣā vai draupadī kṛṣṇā rājaputrī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:24188: 03,251.006a sarveṣāṃ caiva pārthānāṃ priyā bahumatā satī
GE07mbh_03_u:24189: 03,251.006c tayā sametya sauvīra suvīrān susukhī vraja
GE07mbh_03_u:24191: 03,251.007a evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca paśyāmo draupadīm iti
GE07mbh_03_u:24193: 03,251.008a sa praviśyāśramaṃ śūnyaṃ siṃhagoṣṭhaṃ vṛko yathā
GE07mbh_03_u:24194: 03,251.008c ātmanā saptamaḥ kṛṣṇām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:24195: 03,251.009a kuśalaṃ te varārohe bhartāras te 'py anāmayāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24199: 03,251.010c ahaṃ ca bhrātaraś cāsya yāṃś cānyān paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:24200: 03,251.010d*1200_01 api te kuśalaṃ rājye rāṣṭre kośe bale tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:24201: 03,251.010d*1200_02 kaccid ekaḥ śibīn āḍhyān sauvīrān saha sindhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24202: 03,251.010d*1200_03 anutiṣṭhasi dharmeṇa ye cānye viditās tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:24203: 03,251.010d*1201_01 api tvaṃ kuśalī rājan sahāmātyaḥ sahaprajaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24205: 03,251.011c mṛgān pañcāśataṃ caiva prātarāśaṃ dadāni te
GE07mbh_03_u:24206: 03,251.012a aiṇeyān pṛṣatān nyaṅkūn hariṇāñ śarabhāñ śaśān
GE07mbh_03_u:24207: 03,251.012c ṛśyān rurūñ śambarāṃś ca gavayāṃś ca mṛgān bahūn
GE07mbh_03_u:24208: 03,251.013a varāhān mahiṣāṃś caiva yāś cānyā mṛgajātayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24212: 03,251.014c ehi me ratham āroha sukham āpnuhi kevalam
GE07mbh_03_u:24215: 03,251.016a na vai prājñā gataśrīkaṃ bhartāram upayuñjate
GE07mbh_03_u:24216: 03,251.016c yuñjānam anuyuñjīta na śriyaḥ saṃkṣaye vaset
GE07mbh_03_u:24217: 03,251.017a śriyā vihīnā rājyāc ca vinaṣṭāḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24218: 03,251.017c alaṃ te pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ bhaktyā kleśam upāsitum
GE07mbh_03_u:24219: 03,251.018a bhāryā me bhava suśroṇi tyajainān sukham āpnuhi
GE07mbh_03_u:24224: 03,251.020a avamatyāsya tad vākyam ākṣipya ca sumadhyamā
GE07mbh_03_u:24225: 03,251.020c maivam ity abravīt kṛṣṇā lajjasveti ca saindhavam
GE07mbh_03_u:24227: 03,251.021c vilobhayām āsa paraṃ vākyair vākyāni yuñjatī
GE07mbh_03_u:24229: 03,251.021d*1202_01 naivaṃ vada mahābāho nyāyyaṃ tvaṃ na ca manyase
GE07mbh_03_u:24231: 03,251.021d*1202_03 duḥśalā nāma tasyās tvaṃ bhartā rājakulodbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24232: 03,251.021d*1202_04 mama bhrātā ca nyāyyena tvayā rakṣyā mahāratha
GE07mbh_03_u:24234: 03,251.021d*1202_05 dharmiṣṭhānāṃ kule jāto na dharmaṃ tvam avekṣase
GE07mbh_03_u:24235: 03,251.021d*1202_06 ity uktaḥ sindhurājo 'pi vākyam uttaram abravīt
GE07mbh_03_u:24236: 03,251.021d*1202_07 rājñāṃ dharmaṃ na jānīṣe striyo ratnāni caiva hi
GE07mbh_03_u:24238: 03,251.021d*1202_09 svasā ca svasriyā caiva bhrātṛbhāryā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:24239: 03,251.021d*1202_10 saṃgṛhṇanti ca rājānas tāś ca tatra nṛpodbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:24249: 03,252.003a na kiṃ cid īḍyaṃ pravadanti pāpaṃ;
GE07mbh_03_u:24253: 03,252.004a ahaṃ tu manye tava nāsti kaś cid;
GE07mbh_03_u:24273: 03,252.009a yathā ca veṇuḥ kadalī nalo vā;

GE07mbh_03_u:27450: 03,284.012a viditaṃ tena śīlaṃ te sarvasya jagatas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:27451: 03,284.012c yathā tvaṃ bhikṣitaḥ sadbhir dadāsy eva na yācase
GE07mbh_03_u:27452: 03,284.013a tvaṃ hi tāta dadāsy eva brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayācitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27453: 03,284.013c vittaṃ yac cānyad apy āhur na pratyākhyāsi karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:27454: 03,284.014a taṃ tvām evaṃvidhaṃ jñātvā svayaṃ vai pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27456: 03,284.015a tasmai prayācamānāya na deye kuṇḍale tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:27457: 03,284.015c anuneyaḥ paraṃ śaktyā śreya etad dhi te param
GE07mbh_03_u:27458: 03,284.016a kuṇḍalārthe bruvaṃs tāta kāraṇair bahubhis tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:27459: 03,284.016c anyair bahuvidhair vittaiḥ sa nivāryaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27460: 03,284.017a ratnaiḥ strībhis tathā bhogair dhanair bahuvidhair api
GE07mbh_03_u:27462: 03,284.018a yadi dāsyasi karṇa tvaṃ sahaje kuṇḍale śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:27463: 03,284.018c āyuṣaḥ prakṣayaṃ gatvā mṛtyor vaśam upeṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:27464: 03,284.019a kavacena ca saṃyuktaḥ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca mānada
GE07mbh_03_u:27465: 03,284.019c avadhyas tvaṃ raṇe 'rīṇām iti viddhi vaco mama
GE07mbh_03_u:27466: 03,284.020a amṛtād utthitaṃ hy etad ubhayaṃ ratnasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_03_u:27467: 03,284.020c tasmād rakṣyaṃ tvayā karṇa jīvitaṃ cet priyaṃ tava
GE07mbh_03_u:27469: 03,284.021a ko mām evaṃ bhavān prāha darśayan sauhṛdaṃ param
GE07mbh_03_u:27470: 03,284.021c kāmayā bhagavan brūhi ko bhavān dvijaveṣadhṛk
GE07mbh_03_u:27472: 03,284.022a ahaṃ tāta sahasrāṃśuḥ sauhṛdāt tvāṃ nidarśaye
GE07mbh_03_u:27473: 03,284.022c kuruṣvaitad vaco me tvam etac chreyaḥ paraṃ hi te
GE07mbh_03_u:27475: 03,284.023a śreya eva mamātyantaṃ yasya me gopatiḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27476: 03,284.023c pravaktādya hitānveṣī śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_03_u:27477: 03,284.024a prasādaye tvāṃ varadaṃ praṇayāc ca bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:27478: 03,284.024c na nivāryo vratād asmād ahaṃ yady asmi te priyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27479: 03,284.025a vrataṃ vai mama loko 'yaṃ vetti kṛtsno vibhāvaso
GE07mbh_03_u:27480: 03,284.025c yathāhaṃ dvijamukhyebhyo dadyāṃ prāṇān api dhruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:27484: 03,284.027c na me kīrtiḥ praṇaśyeta triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā
GE07mbh_03_u:27486: 03,284.028c yuktaṃ hi yaśasā yuktaṃ maraṇaṃ lokasaṃmatam
GE07mbh_03_u:27487: 03,284.029a so 'ham indrāya dāsyāmi kuṇḍale saha varmaṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:27490: 03,284.030c tan me kīrtikaraṃ loke tasyākīrtir bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:27491: 03,284.031a vṛṇomi kīrtiṃ loke hi jīvitenāpi bhānuman
GE07mbh_03_u:27492: 03,284.031c kīrtimān aśnute svargaṃ hīnakīrtis tu naśyati
GE07mbh_03_u:27493: 03,284.032a kīrtir hi puruṣaṃ loke saṃjīvayati mātṛvat
GE07mbh_03_u:27495: 03,284.033a ayaṃ purāṇaḥ śloko hi svayaṃ gīto vibhāvaso
GE07mbh_03_u:27496: 03,284.033c dhātrā lokeśvara yathā kīrtir āyur narasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:27497: 03,284.034a puruṣasya pare loke kīrtir eva parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:27498: 03,284.034c iha loke viśuddhā ca kīrtir āyurvivardhanī
GE07mbh_03_u:27499: 03,284.035a so 'haṃ śarīraje dattvā kīrtiṃ prāpsyāmi śāśvatīm
GE07mbh_03_u:27500: 03,284.035c dattvā ca vidhivad dānaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_03_u:27501: 03,284.036a hutvā śarīraṃ saṃgrāme kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_03_u:27502: 03,284.036c vijitya vā parān ājau yaśaḥ prāpsyāmi kevalam
GE07mbh_03_u:27504: 03,284.037c vṛddhān bālān dvijātīṃś ca mokṣayitvā mahābhayāt
GE07mbh_03_u:27506: 03,284.038c jīvitenāpi me rakṣyā kīrtis tad viddhi me vratam
GE07mbh_03_u:27507: 03,284.039a so 'haṃ dattvā maghavate bhikṣām etām anuttamām
GE07mbh_03_u:27508: 03,284.039c brāhmaṇacchadmine deva loke gantā parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_03_u:27510: 03,285.001a māhitaṃ karṇa kārṣīs tvam ātmanaḥ suhṛdāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:27511: 03,285.001c putrāṇām atha bhāryāṇām atho mātur atho pituḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27513: 03,285.002c iṣyate yaśasaḥ prāptiḥ kīrtiś ca tridive sthirā
GE07mbh_03_u:27514: 03,285.003a yas tvaṃ prāṇavirodhena kīrtim icchasi śāśvatīm
GE07mbh_03_u:27515: 03,285.003c sā te prāṇān samādāya gamiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27516: 03,285.004a jīvatāṃ kurute kāryaṃ pitā mātā sutās tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:27517: 03,285.004c ye cānye bāndhavāḥ ke cil loke 'smin puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:27518: 03,285.004e rājānaś ca naravyāghra pauruṣeṇa nibodha tat
GE07mbh_03_u:27519: 03,285.005a kīrtiś ca jīvataḥ sādhvī puruṣasya mahādyute
GE07mbh_03_u:27520: 03,285.005c mṛtasya kīrtyā kiṃ kāryaṃ bhasmībhūtasya dehinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27521: 03,285.005e mṛtaḥ kīrtiṃ na jānāti jīvan kīrtiṃ samaśnute
GE07mbh_03_u:27522: 03,285.006a mṛtasya kīrtir martyasya yathā mālā gatāyuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27523: 03,285.006c ahaṃ tu tvāṃ bravīmy etad bhakto 'sīti hitepsayā
GE07mbh_03_u:27524: 03,285.007a bhaktimanto hi me rakṣyā ity etenāpi hetunā
GE07mbh_03_u:27525: 03,285.007c bhakto 'yaṃ parayā bhaktyā mām ity eva mahābhuja
GE07mbh_03_u:27526: 03,285.007e mamāpi bhaktir utpannā sa tvaṃ kuru vaco mama
GE07mbh_03_u:27527: 03,285.008a asti cātra paraṃ kiṃ cid adhyātmaṃ devanirmitam
GE07mbh_03_u:27528: 03,285.008c ataś ca tvāṃ bravīmy etat kriyatām aviśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_03_u:27529: 03,285.009a devaguhyaṃ tvayā jñātuṃ na śakyaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:27530: 03,285.009c tasmān nākhyāmi te guhyaṃ kāle vetsyati tad bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:27531: 03,285.010a punar uktaṃ ca vakṣyāmi tvaṃ rādheya nibodha tat
GE07mbh_03_u:27532: 03,285.010c māsmai te kuṇḍale dadyā bhikṣave vajrapāṇaye
GE07mbh_03_u:27535: 03,285.012a kīrtiś ca jīvataḥ sādhvī puruṣasyeti viddhi tat
GE07mbh_03_u:27541: 03,285.014c puraṃdarasya karṇa tvaṃ buddhim etām apānuda
GE07mbh_03_u:27542: 03,285.015a tva hi nityaṃ naravyāghra spardhase savyasācinā
GE07mbh_03_u:27543: 03,285.015c savyasācī tvayā caiva yudhi śūraḥ sameṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:27544: 03,285.016a na tu tvām arjunaḥ śaktaḥ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ samanvitam
GE07mbh_03_u:27545: 03,285.016c vijetuṃ yudhi yady asya svayam indraḥ śaro bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:27546: 03,285.017a tasmān na deye śakrāya tvayaite kuṇḍale śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:27549: 03,286.001a bhagavantam ahaṃ bhakto yathā māṃ vettha gopate
GE07mbh_03_u:27550: 03,286.001c tathā paramatigmāṃśo nānyaṃ devaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_03_u:27551: 03,286.002a na me dārā na me putrā na cātmā suhṛdo na ca
GE07mbh_03_u:27552: 03,286.002c tatheṣṭā vai sadā bhaktyā yathā tvaṃ gopate mama
GE07mbh_03_u:27553: 03,286.003a iṣṭānāṃ ca mahātmāno bhaktānāṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27554: 03,286.003c kurvanti bhaktim iṣṭāṃ ca jānīṣe tvaṃ ca bhāskara
GE07mbh_03_u:27555: 03,286.004a iṣṭo bhaktaś ca me karṇo na cānyad daivataṃ divi
GE07mbh_03_u:27556: 03,286.004c jānīta iti vai kṛtvā bhagavān āha maddhitam
GE07mbh_03_u:27557: 03,286.005a bhūyaś ca śirasā yāce prasādya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27558: 03,286.005c iti bravīmi tigmāṃśo tvaṃ tu me kṣantum arhasi
GE07mbh_03_u:27559: 03,286.006a bibhemi na tathā mṛtyor yathā bibhye 'nṛtād aham
GE07mbh_03_u:27562: 03,286.007a yac ca mām āttha deva tvaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ phalgunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:27563: 03,286.007c vyetu saṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ tava bhāskara mānasam
GE07mbh_03_u:27564: 03,286.007e arjunaṃ prati māṃ caiva vijeṣyāmi raṇe 'rjunam
GE07mbh_03_u:27565: 03,286.008a tavāpi viditaṃ deva mamāpy astrabalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:27566: 03,286.008c jāmadagnyād upāttaṃ yat tathā droṇān mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27567: 03,286.009a idaṃ tvam anujānīhi suraśreṣṭha vrataṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:27568: 03,286.009c bhikṣate vajriṇe dadyām api jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27570: 03,286.010a yadi tāta dadāsy ete vajriṇe kuṇḍale śubhe
GE07mbh_03_u:27571: 03,286.010c tvam apy enam atho brūyā vijayārthaṃ mahābala
GE07mbh_03_u:27572: 03,286.011a niyamena pradadyās tvaṃ kuṇḍale vai śatakratoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27573: 03,286.011c avadhyo hy asi bhūtānāṃ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27575: 03,286.012c prārthayāno raṇe vatsa kuṇḍale te jihīrṣati
GE07mbh_03_u:27576: 03,286.013a sa tvam apy enam ārādhya sūnṛtābhiḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27579: 03,286.014c dāsyāmi te sahasrākṣa kuṇḍale varma cottamam
GE07mbh_03_u:27580: 03,286.015a ity evaṃ niyamena tvaṃ dadyāḥ śakrāya kuṇḍale
GE07mbh_03_u:27581: 03,286.015c tayā tvaṃ karṇa saṃgrāme haniṣyasi raṇe ripūn
GE07mbh_03_u:27582: 03,286.016a nāhatvā hi mahābāho śatrūn eti karaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27586: 03,286.017b*1335_01 karṇas tu bubudhe rājan svapnānte pravyathann iva

GE07mbh_03_u:27590: 03,286.017b*1335_05 śaktyā tasmai pradāsyāmi kuṇḍale varma caiva ha
GE07mbh_03_u:27591: 03,286.017b*1335_06 sa kṛtvā prātar utthāya kāryāṇi bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:27594: 03,286.017c tataḥ sūryāya japyānte karṇaḥ svapnaṃ nyavedayat
GE07mbh_03_u:27596: 03,286.018c tat sarvam ānupūrvyeṇa śaśaṃsāsmai vṛṣas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:27597: 03,286.019a tac chrutvā bhagavān devo bhānuḥ svarbhānusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27598: 03,286.019c uvāca taṃ tathety eva karṇaṃ sūryaḥ smayann iva
GE07mbh_03_u:27599: 03,286.020a tatas tattvam iti jñātvā rādheyaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_03_u:27602: 03,287.001a kiṃ tad guhyaṃ na cākhyātaṃ karṇāyehoṣṇaraśminā
GE07mbh_03_u:27603: 03,287.001c kīdṛśe kuṇḍale te ca kavacaṃ caiva kīdṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:27604: 03,287.002a kutaś ca kavacaṃ tasya kuṇḍale caiva sattama
GE07mbh_03_u:27605: 03,287.002c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me brūhi tapodhana
GE07mbh_03_u:27606: 03,287.002d*1336_01 yat tad vivasvato guhyaṃ yādṛśe kuṇḍale ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:27607: 03,287.002d*1336_02 ubhayaṃ tad yathā brahmaṃs tan mamācakṣva sattama
GE07mbh_03_u:27609: 03,287.003a ayaṃ rājan bravīmy etad yat tad guhyaṃ vibhāvasoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27610: 03,287.003c yādṛśe kuṇḍale caiva kavacaṃ caiva yādṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:27616: 03,287.006c bhikṣām icchāmy ahaṃ bhoktuṃ tava gehe vimatsara
GE07mbh_03_u:27617: 03,287.007a na me vyalīkaṃ kartavyaṃ tvayā vā tava cānugaiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27618: 03,287.007c evaṃ vatsyāmi te gehe yadi te rocate 'nagha
GE07mbh_03_u:27619: 03,287.008a yathākāmaṃ ca gaccheyam āgaccheyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:27620: 03,287.008c śayyāsane ca me rājan nāparādhyeta kaś cana
