GE07mbh_03_u:27623: 03,287.010a mama kanyā mahābrahman pṛthā nāma yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_03_u:27624: 03,287.010c śīlavṛttānvitā sādhvī niyatā na ca māninī
GE07mbh_03_u:27625: 03,287.011a upasthāsyati sā tvāṃ vai pūjayānavamanya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:27627: 03,287.012a evam uktvā tu taṃ vipram abhipūjya yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_03_u:27629: 03,287.013a ayaṃ vatse mahābhāgo brāhmaṇo vastum icchati
GE07mbh_03_u:27630: 03,287.013c mama gehe mayā cāsya tathety evaṃ pratiśrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:27632: 03,287.014c tan me vākyaṃ na mithyā tvaṃ kartum arhasi karhi cit
GE07mbh_03_u:27634: 03,287.015c yad yad brūyān mahātejās tat tad deyam amatsarāt
GE07mbh_03_u:27635: 03,287.016a brāhmaṇā hi paraṃ tejo brāhmaṇā hi paraṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27637: 03,287.017a amānayan hi mānārhān vātāpiś ca mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27639: 03,287.018a so 'yaṃ vatse mahābhāra āhitas tvayi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_03_u:27641: 03,287.019a jānāmi praṇidhānaṃ te bālyāt prabhṛti nandini
GE07mbh_03_u:27642: 03,287.019c brāhmaṇeṣv iha sarveṣu gurubandhuṣu caiva ha
GE07mbh_03_u:27644: 03,287.020c mayi caiva yathāvat tvaṃ sarvam ādṛtya vartase
GE07mbh_03_u:27645: 03,287.021a na hy atuṣṭo jano 'stīha pure cāntaḥpure ca te
GE07mbh_03_u:27647: 03,287.022a saṃdeṣṭavyāṃ tu manye tvāṃ dvijātiṃ kopanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_03_u:27648: 03,287.022c pṛthe bāleti kṛtvā vai sutā cāsi mameti ca
GE07mbh_03_u:27649: 03,287.023a vṛṣṇīnāṃ tvaṃ kule jātā śūrasya dayitā sutā
GE07mbh_03_u:27650: 03,287.023c dattā prītimatā mahyaṃ pitrā bālā purā svayam
GE07mbh_03_u:27652: 03,287.024c agryam agre pratijñāya tenāsi duhitā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:27653: 03,287.025a tādṛśe hi kule jātā kule caiva vivardhitā
GE07mbh_03_u:27654: 03,287.025c sukhāt sukham anuprāptā hradād dhradam ivāgatā
GE07mbh_03_u:27655: 03,287.026a dauṣkuleyā viśeṣeṇa kathaṃ cit pragrahaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27658: 03,287.027c tena tenāsi saṃpannā samupetā ca bhāminī
GE07mbh_03_u:27659: 03,287.028a sā tvaṃ darpaṃ parityajya dambhaṃ mānaṃ ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_03_u:27660: 03,287.028c ārādhya varadaṃ vipraṃ śreyasā yokṣyase pṛthe
GE07mbh_03_u:27661: 03,287.029a evaṃ prāpsyasi kalyāṇi kalyāṇam anaghe dhruvam
GE07mbh_03_u:27662: 03,287.029c kopite tu dvijaśreṣṭhe kṛtsnaṃ dahyeta me kulam
GE07mbh_03_u:27665: 03,288.001c yathāpratijñaṃ rājendra na ca mithyā bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_03_u:27666: 03,288.002a eṣa caiva svabhāvo me pūjayeyaṃ dvijān iti
GE07mbh_03_u:27667: 03,288.002c tava caiva priyaṃ kāryaṃ śreyaś caitat paraṃ mama
GE07mbh_03_u:27668: 03,288.003a yady evaiṣyati sāyāhne yadi prātar atho niśi
GE07mbh_03_u:27669: 03,288.003c yady ardharātre bhagavān na me kopaṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:27670: 03,288.004a lābho mamaiṣa rājendra yad vai pūjayatī dvijān
GE07mbh_03_u:27671: 03,288.004c ādeśe tava tiṣṭhantī hitaṃ kuryāṃ narottama
GE07mbh_03_u:27672: 03,288.005a visrabdho bhava rājendra na vyalīkaṃ dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27673: 03,288.005c vasan prāpsyati te gehe satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_03_u:27674: 03,288.006a yat priyaṃ ca dvijasyāsya hitaṃ caiva tavānagha
GE07mbh_03_u:27675: 03,288.006c yatiṣyāmi tathā rājan vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27677: 03,288.007c tāraṇāya samarthāḥ syur viparīte vadhāya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:27679: 03,288.008c na matkṛte vyathāṃ rājan prāpsyasi dvijasattamāt
GE07mbh_03_u:27680: 03,288.009a aparādhe hi rājendra rājñām aśreyase dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:27681: 03,288.009c bhavanti cyavano yadvat sukanyāyāḥ kṛte purā
GE07mbh_03_u:27683: 03,288.010c yathā tvayā narendredaṃ bhāṣitaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ prati

GE07mbh_03_u:28663: 03,297.062a vyākhyātā me tvayā praśnā yāthātathyaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_03_u:28664: 03,297.062c puruṣaṃ tv idānīm ākhyāhi yaś ca sarvadhanī naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28666: 03,297.063a divaṃ spṛśati bhūmiṃ ca śabdaḥ puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28667: 03,297.063c yāvat sa śabdo bhavati tāvat puruṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_03_u:28668: 03,297.064a tulye priyāpriye yasya sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_03_u:28669: 03,297.064b*1384_01 samatvaṃ yasya sarveṣu sa vai puruṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_03_u:28671: 03,297.064c atītānāgate cobhe sa vai sarvadhanī naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28673: 03,297.065a vyākhyātaḥ puruṣo rājan yaś ca sarvadhanī naraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28674: 03,297.065c tasmāt tavaiko bhrātṝṇāṃ yam icchasi sa jīvatu
GE07mbh_03_u:28676: 03,297.066a śyāmo ya eṣa raktākṣo bṛhacchāla ivodgataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28679: 03,297.067a priyas te bhīmaseno 'yam arjuno vaḥ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_03_u:28680: 03,297.067c sa kasmān nakulaṃ rājan sāpatnaṃ jīvam icchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:28682: 03,297.068c tulyaṃ taṃ bhīmam utsṛjya nakulaṃ jīvam icchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:28683: 03,297.069a tathainaṃ manujāḥ prāhur bhīmasenaṃ priyaṃ tava
GE07mbh_03_u:28686: 03,297.070c arjunaṃ tam apāhāya nakulaṃ jīvam icchasi
GE07mbh_03_u:28688: 03,297.071*1385_01 dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakṣati rakṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28689: 03,297.071*1385_02 tasmād dharmaṃ na tyajāmi mā no dharmo hato vadhīt
GE07mbh_03_u:28690: 03,297.071a ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ paramārthāc ca me matam
GE07mbh_03_u:28692: 03,297.072a dharmaśīlaḥ sadā rājā iti māṃ mānavā viduḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28693: 03,297.072c svadharmān na caliṣyāmi nakulo yakṣa jīvatu
GE07mbh_03_u:28694: 03,297.072d*1386_01 kuntī caiva tu mādrī ca dve bhārye tu pitur mama
GE07mbh_03_u:28695: 03,297.072d*1386_02 ubhe saputre syātāṃ vai iti me dhīyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28696: 03,297.073a yathā kuntī tathā mādrī viśeṣo nāsti me tayoḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28697: 03,297.073c mātṛbhyāṃ samam icchāmi nakulo yakṣa jīvatu
GE07mbh_03_u:28699: 03,297.074a yasya te 'rthāc ca kāmāc ca ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paraṃ matam
GE07mbh_03_u:28700: 03,297.074c tasmāt te bhrātaraḥ sarve jīvantu bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:28703: 03,298.001c kṣutpipāse ca sarveṣāṃ kṣaṇe tasmin vyagacchatām
GE07mbh_03_u:28706: 03,298.002c pṛcchāmi ko bhavān devo na me yakṣo mato bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:28707: 03,298.003a vasūnāṃ vā bhavān eko rudrāṇām atha vā bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:28708: 03,298.003c atha vā marutāṃ śreṣṭho vajrī vā tridaśeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28710: 03,298.004c na taṃ yogaṃ prapaśyāmi yena syur vinipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28712: 03,298.005c sa bhavān suhṛd asmākam atha vā naḥ pitā bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:28714: 03,298.006a ahaṃ te janakas tāta dharmo mṛduparākrama
GE07mbh_03_u:28715: 03,298.006c tvāṃ didṛkṣur anuprāpto viddhi māṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_03_u:28716: 03,298.007a yaśaḥ satyaṃ damaḥ śaucam ārjavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
GE07mbh_03_u:28717: 03,298.007c dānaṃ tapo brahmacaryam ity etās tanavo mama
GE07mbh_03_u:28718: 03,298.008a ahiṃsā samatā śāntis tapaḥ śaucam amatsaraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28719: 03,298.008c dvārāṇy etāni me viddhi priyo hy asi sadā mama
GE07mbh_03_u:28720: 03,298.009a diṣṭyā pañcasu rakto 'si diṣṭyā te ṣaṭpadī jitā
GE07mbh_03_u:28721: 03,298.009c dve pūrve madhyame dve ca dve cānte sāṃparāyike
GE07mbh_03_u:28722: 03,298.010a dharmo 'ham asmi bhadraṃ te jijñāsus tvām ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28724: 03,298.010d*1387_01 kāmakrodhau tu prathamau lobhamohau tu madhyamau
GE07mbh_03_u:28725: 03,298.010d*1387_02 ante bhayaviṣādau ca eṣā sā ṣaṭpadī smṛtā
GE07mbh_03_u:28726: 03,298.011a varaṃ vṛṇīṣva rājendra dātā hy asmi tavānagha
GE07mbh_03_u:28727: 03,298.011c ye hi me puruṣā bhaktā na teṣām asti durgatiḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28730: 03,298.012c tasyāgnayo na lupyeran prathamo 'stu varo mama
GE07mbh_03_u:28736: 03,298.014c anyaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te varaṃ tvam amaropama
GE07mbh_03_u:28739: 03,298.015c tatra no nābhijānīyur vasato manujāḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_03_u:28743: 03,298.017a yady api svena rūpeṇa cariṣyatha mahīm imām
GE07mbh_03_u:28744: 03,298.017c na vo vijñāsyate kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_03_u:28747: 03,298.019a yad vaḥ saṃkalpitaṃ rūpaṃ manasā yasya yādṛśam
GE07mbh_03_u:28750: 03,298.020c jijñāsārthaṃ mayā hy etad āhṛtaṃ mṛgarūpiṇā
GE07mbh_03_u:28751: 03,298.020d*1388_01 pravṛṇīṣvāparaṃ saumya varam iṣṭaṃ dadāni te
GE07mbh_03_u:28752: 03,298.020d*1388_02 na tṛpyāmi naraśreṣṭha prayacchan vai varāṃs tava
GE07mbh_03_u:28753: 03,298.021a tṛtīyaṃ gṛhyatāṃ putra varam apratimaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_03_u:28754: 03,298.021c tvaṃ hi matprabhavo rājan viduraś ca mamāṃśabhāk
GE07mbh_03_u:28756: 03,298.022a devadevo mayā dṛṣṭo bhavān sākṣāt sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28757: 03,298.022c yaṃ dadāsi varaṃ tuṣṭas taṃ grahīṣyāmy ahaṃ pitaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28758: 03,298.023a jayeyaṃ lobhamohau ca krodhaṃ cāhaṃ sadā vibho
GE07mbh_03_u:28759: 03,298.023c dāne tapasi satye ca mano me satataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_03_u:28762: 03,298.024c bhavān dharmaḥ punaś caiva yathoktaṃ te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_03_u:28766: 03,298.026a abhyetya cāśramaṃ vīrāḥ sarva eva gataklamāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28780: 03,299.002a ye tadbhaktā vasanti sma vanavāse tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28781: 03,299.002c tān abruvan mahātmānaḥ śiṣṭāḥ prāñjalayas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:28783: 03,299.003a viditaṃ bhavatāṃ sarvaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrair yathā vayam
GE07mbh_03_u:28784: 03,299.003c chadmanā hṛtarājyāś ca niḥsvāś ca bahuśaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28785: 03,299.004a uṣitāś ca vane kṛcchraṃ yatra dvādaśa vatsarān
GE07mbh_03_u:28787: 03,299.004e tad vatsyāmo vayaṃ channās tad anujñātum arhatha
GE07mbh_03_u:28788: 03,299.005a suyodhanaś ca duṣṭātmā karṇaś ca sahasaubalaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28790: 03,299.005e yuktācārāś ca yuktāś ca paurasya svajanasya ca
GE07mbh_03_u:28791: 03,299.005f*1389_01 durātmanāṃ hi kas teṣāṃ viśvāsaṃ gantum arhati
GE07mbh_03_u:28792: 03,299.006a api nas tad bhaved bhūyo yad vayaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:28794: 03,299.007a ity uktvā duḥkhaśokārtaḥ śucir dharmasutas tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:28796: 03,299.008a tam athāśvāsayan sarve brāhmaṇā bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_03_u:28797: 03,299.008c atha dhaumyo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mahārthaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:28798: 03,299.009a rājan vidvān bhavān dāntaḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28799: 03,299.009c naivaṃvidhāḥ pramuhyanti narāḥ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_03_u:28800: 03,299.010a devair apy āpadaḥ prāptāś channaiś ca bahuśas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:28807: 03,299.013c baler yathā hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ vikramais tac ca te śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:28808: 03,299.014a aurveṇa vasatā channam ūrau brahmarṣiṇā tadā
GE07mbh_03_u:28809: 03,299.014c yatkṛtaṃ tāta lokeṣu tac ca sarvaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:28811: 03,299.015c vajraṃ praviśya śakrasya yatkṛtaṃ tac ca te śrutam
GE07mbh_03_u:28812: 03,299.016a hutāśanena yac cāpaḥ praviśya channam āsatā
GE07mbh_03_u:28813: 03,299.016c vibudhānāṃ kṛtaṃ karma tac ca sarvaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_03_u:28815: 03,299.017c nirdagdhāḥ śatravaḥ sarve vasatā bhuvi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28816: 03,299.018a viṣṇunā vasatā cāpi gṛhe daśarathasya vai
GE07mbh_03_u:28818: 03,299.019a evam ete mahātmānaḥ pracchannās tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_03_u:28819: 03,299.019c ajayañ śātravān yuddhe tathā tvam api jeṣyasi
GE07mbh_03_u:28821: 03,299.020c śāstrabuddhyā svabuddhyā ca na cacāla yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28825: 03,299.022c dharmānugatayā buddhyā na kiṃ cit sāhasaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_03_u:28826: 03,299.023a sahadevo mayā nityaṃ nakulaś ca nivāritau
GE07mbh_03_u:28828: 03,299.024a na vayaṃ tat prahāsyāmo yasmin yokṣyati no bhavān
GE07mbh_03_u:28829: 03,299.024c bhavān vidhattāṃ tat sarvaṃ kṣipraṃ jeṣyāmahe parān
GE07mbh_03_u:28831: 03,299.025c prayujyāpṛcchya bharatān yathāsvān svān yayur gṛhān
GE07mbh_03_u:28832: 03,299.026a sarve vedavido mukhyā yatayo munayas tathā
GE07mbh_03_u:28834: 03,299.027a saha dhaumyena vidvāṃsas tathā te pañca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_03_u:28835: 03,299.027c utthāya prayayur vīrāḥ kṛṣṇām ādāya bhārata
